original: yon tan skyon blta ba ste /
analyzed: yon tan skyon blta ba ste /
translated: The examination of good qualities and faults.

original: slob ma yongs su brtag pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma yongs su brtag pa'o //
translated: The examination of the disciple.

original: sdom pa dang dam tshig dag ston pa gang yin pa de yang le'u yang de yin pas de bzhin no //
analyzed: sdom pa dang dam tshig dag ston pa gang yin pa de yang le'u yang de yin pas de bzhin no //
translated: The one who teaches the vows and the pledges is also the chapter, thus it is so.

original: nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o zhes bya ba ni//
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o zhes bya ba ni//
translated: The twenty-sixth.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
translated: The commentary on the twenty-sixth chapter of the Shri-Chakrasamvara.üîΩThen, after the actual protection of the pledges and so on, the sign of power, and the conduct of the yoginis, the conduct of the yoginis should be understood as the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.

original: // / de nas zhes pa ni dam tshig dngos su bskyang ba la sogs pa dngos grub kyi mtshan ma dang rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid sngags kyi nus pa'i rjes su spyod pa'i brtul zhugs yin zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa ni dam tshig dngos su bskyang ba la sogs pa dngos grub kyi mtshan ma dang rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid sngags kyi nus pa'i rjes su spyod pa'i brtul zhugs yin zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: The conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.

original: spyod pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i spyod pa ste /üîΩde'i brtul zhugs la gcig tu rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i spyod pa ste / de'i brtul zhugs la gcig tu rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: The conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.

original: de yang ci byas nas sam gang gis spyad par bya zhes pa la de yang dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs te /
analyzed: de yang ci byas nas sam gang gis spyad par bya zhes pa la de yang dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs te /
translated: The conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.

original: ni ni nye bar gzung ba'o //
analyzed: ni ni nye bar gzung ba'o //
translated: The conduct of the yoginis is the conduct of the yoginis.üîΩThe conduct of the yogin

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid bye brag tu shes pa nyid rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sgrub pa po dpa' bo yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid bye brag tu shes pa nyid rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sgrub pa po dpa' bo yin no //
translated: The hero, the adept of all yoginis, is one who knows the characteristics of the yoginis in particular.

original: ci'i phyir gang zhes pa la //
analyzed: ci'i phyir gang zhes pa la //
translated: Why?

original: myur du dngos grub 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: myur du dngos grub 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: He quickly enters into power.

original: grong dang grong du de rab song //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: grong dang grong du de rab song // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He goes to every town and village.

original: skye 'gro rnams tshogs pa la rnal 'byor @204b pa de tshogs kyi nang du 'gro ba ste song ba'o //
analyzed: skye 'gro rnams tshogs pa la rnal 'byor @204b pa de tshogs kyi nang du 'gro ba ste song ba'o //
translated: The yogin goes to the assembly of people, that is, he goes to the assembly.

original: de na pho nya rab gnas so //
analyzed: de na pho nya rab gnas so //
translated: There, the messenger is well-established.

original: zhes blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes blta bar bya ste /
translated: This should be seen.

original: mngon du 'gyur zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: mngon du 'gyur zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is intended that [he] manifests.

original: de ci ltar shes par bya zhes pa la gzugs nyid kyis mtshon pa yin zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de ci ltar shes par bya zhes pa la gzugs nyid kyis mtshon pa yin zhes gsungs te /
translated: How is that to be known? It is said that it is indicated by form itself.

original: gzugs nyid kyis mtshon pa ni rtogs pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyis mtshon pa ni rtogs pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: Indication by form itself is the cause of realization.

original: de yang sngar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de yang sngar bstan pa'o //
translated: And that has been taught before.

original: pho nya dag dang ral gri'i so'i brtul zhugs 'di gnyis ni dag byed do //
analyzed: pho nya dag dang ral gri'i so'i brtul zhugs 'di gnyis ni dag byed do //
translated: These two, the messenger and the vow of the sword's edge, are the purifiers.

original: de'i phyir bsod nams 'phel byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsod nams 'phel byed do //
translated: Therefore, it increases merit.

original: gang gis 'dod pas ral gri'i so'i brtul zhugs de nyid dag par byed do //
analyzed: gang gis 'dod pas ral gri'i so'i brtul zhugs de nyid dag par byed do //
translated: By whom, through the practice of the sword-edge, that very desire is purified.

original: de'i bsam pa khas blangs nas brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bsam pa khas blangs nas brjod pa'o //
translated: Having accepted that intention, it is expressed.

original: de la dag byed ces pa ni gnyis kyi bar du so phyung ma thag gi ral gri bzhag nas 'dod pa la yid spro ba'i 'dod ma'i lam du nyal ba ni ral gri'i brtul zhugs so //
analyzed: de la dag byed ces pa ni gnyis kyi bar du so phyung ma thag gi ral gri bzhag nas 'dod pa la yid spro ba'i 'dod ma'i lam du nyal ba ni ral gri'i brtul zhugs so //
translated: There, the purifier is as follows: Having placed a sword between the two, immediately after the blade has been drawn, lying on the path of the woman who delights in desire is the practice of the sword.

original: yang na pho nya dang ral gri'i so bzhin 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: yang na pho nya dang ral gri'i so bzhin 'dra ba ste /
translated: Or, the messengers are like the edge of a sword,

original: goms par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: goms par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they are difficult to get used to.

original: 'on kyang pho nya rnams mthong ba ni shin tu yang dag par byed do //
analyzed: 'on kyang pho nya rnams mthong ba ni shin tu yang dag par byed do //
translated: However, seeing the messengers is very purifying.

original: bsod nams 'phel bas ral gri'i so yang yin te /
analyzed: bsod nams 'phel bas ral gri'i so yang yin te /
translated: By the increase of merit, there is also the edge of the sword,

original: don sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: don sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: which accomplishes the purpose.

original: dang po ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: dang po ni bsdu ba'o //
translated: The first is the collection.

original: de'i phyir legs par 'dres bas dngos grub thob ces pa ni pho nya mthong ba la sogs pas legs par 'dres na sgrub pa po dngos grub thob pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir legs par 'dres bas dngos grub thob ces pa ni pho nya mthong ba la sogs pas legs par 'dres na sgrub pa po dngos grub thob pa'o //
translated: Therefore, attained through proper mixing means that the adept attains power through proper mixing with seeing the messengers and so forth.

original: gang zhes pa la pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang zhes pa la pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The one is the messenger, etc.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma mthong ba la sogs bas pho nya yang grub pa ni phyi rol gyi bzlas pa dang bsgom pa dang mchod pa med par yang gang yin ba mngon du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma mthong ba la sogs bas pho nya yang grub pa ni phyi rol gyi bzlas pa dang bsgom pa dang mchod pa med par yang gang yin ba mngon du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The messenger is accomplished by seeing such a yoginƒ´, etc., and is manifested without external repetition, meditation, and worship.

original: myur ba nyid ni bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa la sogs pa dgag pa'o //
analyzed: myur ba nyid ni bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa la sogs pa dgag pa'o //
translated: Quickly excludes eons, countless eons, etc.

original: yang na sngags kyi bzlas pa dang dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang mchod pa rnam pa lngas lha la mchod ba med par yang pho nyas 'grub pa zhes pa ni de lta bur gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma de ni shin tu yang phul du byung zhes brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sngags kyi bzlas pa dang dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang mchod pa rnam pa lngas lha la mchod ba med par yang pho nyas 'grub pa zhes pa ni de lta bur gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma de ni shin tu yang phul du byung zhes brjod pa'o //
translated: Or, the messenger is accomplished without the worship of the deity by means of mantra repetition, mandala meditation, and the five types of worship. Such a yoginƒ´ is said to be extremely excellent.

original: pho nya ni pho nya mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: pho nya ni pho nya mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The messenger is the female messenger, etc.

original: sngags kyang yin la phyag pa la sogs pa med par yang mi byed par de nyid kyis sgrub pa po sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sngags kyang yin la phyag pa la sogs pa med par yang mi byed par de nyid kyis sgrub pa po sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
translated: He is a mantra practitioner, and he is not without the mudras, and so he is called a ‚Äúpractitioner by means of that.‚Äù

original: pho nya dang legs bar 'dres pa bdag nyid kyi tshe brjod do zhes kha cig zer ro //
analyzed: pho nya dang legs bar 'dres pa bdag nyid kyi tshe brjod do zhes kha cig zer ro //
translated: Some say that the self-life force is expressed by the messenger and the one who is well-mixed.

original: pho nya mthong ba nyid mchod pa la sogs ba rab tu 'jug ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: pho nya mthong ba nyid mchod pa la sogs ba rab tu 'jug ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach that the one who engages in worship, etc. is just the one who sees the messenger, he says ‚Äúworship,‚Äù etc.

original: sngags kyang yin la phyag rgya yang yin pas sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sngags kyang yin la phyag rgya yang yin pas sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
translated: Since he is a mantra and he is a mudra, he is a mantra-mudra.

original: 'di la zhes ba ni pho nya mthong ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes ba ni pho nya mthong ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHere‚Äù refers to seeing the messenger, etc.

original: de ltar bstan bcos zhes pa ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i brjod pa'i rnal 'byor @205a * //üîΩma'i rgyud las so //
analyzed: de ltar bstan bcos zhes pa ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i brjod pa'i rnal 'byor @205a * // ma'i rgyud las so //
translated: ‚ÄúThus in the treatise‚Äù refers to the Yoginƒ´tantra that expresses the Shri Kalachakra.

original: de nyid kyi phyir pho nya lam la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor pa gdams ngag la nye bar gnas pa'i sgrub pa po yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir pho nya lam la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor pa gdams ngag la nye bar gnas pa'i sgrub pa po yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the practitioner is the one who delights in the path of the messenger, and he is the one who abides in the oral instructions.

original: rtag tu ni thams cad du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ni thams cad du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù means in all cases.

original: dngos grub ched du byed pa ni de la gzhol ba'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ched du byed pa ni de la gzhol ba'o //
translated: The one who is intent on power is the one who is devoted to that.

original: pho nya'i lam la dga' ba'i sgrub pa po dngos grub ched du byed ces ba'i gzhung gzhan no ;
analyzed: pho nya'i lam la dga' ba'i sgrub pa po dngos grub ched du byed ces ba'i gzhung gzhan no ;
translated: The adept who delights in the path of the messenger is the one who is intent on power, according to another text.

original: / ni ni gang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: / ni ni gang gi phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúfor‚Äù is because.

original: dmigs kyis dgar ba'i drug pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs kyis dgar ba'i drug pa'o //
translated: The genitive is implied.

original: pho nya'i lam la dga' ba'i nang nas kha cig dngos grub ched du byed pa de ni sgrub pa po yin no //
analyzed: pho nya'i lam la dga' ba'i nang nas kha cig dngos grub ched du byed pa de ni sgrub pa po yin no //
translated: Among those who delight in the path of the messenger, the one who is intent on power is the adept.

original: mnyes bar byed pa'i khyad par ston te /
analyzed: mnyes bar byed pa'i khyad par ston te /
translated: The distinctive feature of pleasing is taught.

original: zas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúfood, etc.‚Äù

original: dang ni mnyes par byed par bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: dang ni mnyes par byed par bsdu ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúand‚Äù includes pleasing.

original: zas ni gcig tu bza' ba'o //
analyzed: zas ni gcig tu bza' ba'o //
translated: Food is what is eaten.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams la gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams la gsol bar bya'o //
translated: It should be offered to the yoginƒ´s.

original: rtag tu ni rgyun du bar ma chad pa dus ring por ro //
analyzed: rtag tu ni rgyun du bar ma chad pa dus ring por ro //
translated: Always means continuously, uninterruptedly, for a long time.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya yang dag ldan //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with mantra and seal

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa dang ldan no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa dang ldan no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: means endowed with mantra recitation, etc.

original: 'di'i don du /
analyzed: 'di'i don du /
translated: For this purpose,

original: sgrub pa po ni legs mnyam gzhag //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni legs mnyam gzhag //
translated: The adept is well equipoised.

original: ces pa ni legs mnyam gzhag ni dpal he ru ka byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: ces pa ni legs mnyam gzhag ni dpal he ru ka byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: This is the same as ‚Äúthe adept is well equipoised‚Äù in the glorious Heruka.üîΩHe is engaged in all yogas.

original: rnal 'byor kun la rab tu 'jug / ces pa ni gzhung gzhan te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor kun la rab tu 'jug / ces pa ni gzhung gzhan te /
translated: This is from another text.

original: dang po'i don la drug pa'o //
analyzed: dang po'i don la drug pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the first is the sixth.

original: brtan ba dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor la rab tu 'jug pa la //
analyzed: brtan ba dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor la rab tu 'jug pa la //
translated: He is engaged in the yoga of the emptiness of the animate and inanimate, etc.

original: bag med rnams la dbang med phyir //
analyzed: bag med rnams la dbang med phyir //
translated: Because of the powerlessness of the heedless.

original: zhes legs par mnyam par gzhag pas zhes pa ni don gzhan no //
analyzed: zhes legs par mnyam par gzhag pas zhes pa ni don gzhan no //
translated: ‚ÄúWell equipoised‚Äù has a different meaning.

original: rigs rnams kun la spyad byas shing //
analyzed: rigs rnams kun la spyad byas shing //
translated: Having enjoyed all the clans.

original: zhes pa ni rigs thams cad dang lhan cig tu bza' ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rigs thams cad dang lhan cig tu bza' ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means ‚Äúhaving eaten together with all the clans.‚Äù

original: 'di ni bza' ba'o 'di ni mi bza' ba'o zhes bye brag tu mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bza' ba'o 'di ni mi bza' ba'o zhes bye brag tu mi bya'o //
translated: One should not make distinctions such as ‚Äúthis is to be eaten, this is not to be eaten.‚Äù

original: de ltar ci'i phyir ma lus pa byed ces ba la ni /
analyzed: de ltar ci'i phyir ma lus pa byed ces ba la ni /
translated: Why is it that one should do everything?

original: de nyid du ni dbyer med de //
analyzed: de nyid du ni dbyer med de //
translated: It is indivisible in reality.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: ma lus pa dbyer med par de spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa de kho na nyid du gcig gi ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: ma lus pa dbyer med par de spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa de kho na nyid du gcig gi ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: The yogin who practices that is of the nature of oneness in reality, without exception.

original: pho nya dag kyang dbyer med pa ste thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pho nya dag kyang dbyer med pa ste thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The messengers are also inseparable, because everything is inseparable.

original: de'i phyir pho nya ma'i zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir pho nya ma'i zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúthe messengers.‚Äù

original: grub pa gnyis zhes pa ni grub pa gnyis mi rtog pa dang pho nya yang ngo //
analyzed: grub pa gnyis zhes pa ni grub pa gnyis mi rtog pa dang pho nya yang ngo //
translated: The two accomplishments are the two accomplishments of non-conceptuality and the messenger.

original: sgrub pa gnyis zhes pa ni rnam pa gnyis bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa gnyis zhes pa ni rnam pa gnyis bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: The two practices are the two aspects to be practiced.

original: de nyid 'jig rten pa'i bde ba nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig po kho na ni sgrub byed kyi cha'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'jig rten pa'i bde ba nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig po kho na ni sgrub byed kyi cha'o //
translated: That very one, with or without afflictions, is the mundane bliss, and the supramundane bliss alone, without afflictions, is the component to be accomplished.

original: kho na ni shin tu yang nges par byas pa'o //
analyzed: kho na ni shin tu yang nges par byas pa'o //
translated: It is said to be ‚Äúonly,‚Äù which is also very certain.

original: de gang yin zhes pa la pho nya zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de gang yin zhes pa la pho nya zhes gsungs te /
translated: What is that? It is said to be the messenger.

original: gnyis ka'i dngos grub kyi don du pho nya nyid //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i dngos grub kyi don du pho nya nyid //
translated: The messenger alone is for the sake of the accomplishment of both.

original: 'ba' zhig yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not anything else.

original: @205b gang gi phyir rnam par mi rtog de'i drin gyis 'grub ces bya'o //
analyzed: @205b gang gi phyir rnam par mi rtog de'i drin gyis 'grub ces bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonconceptual, one accomplishes through his kindness.üîΩWhat is his kindness?

original: de'i drin ci zhes pa la rab tu bskul zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i drin ci zhes pa la rab tu bskul zhes gsungs te /
translated: He is called the ‚Äúencourager.‚ÄùüîΩBy what kindness is he the encourager?

original: drin gang gis bskul bas de'i bsam pa 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: drin gang gis bskul bas de'i bsam pa 'grub pa ste /
translated: He accomplishes his intention.

original: sngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: sngon du byed pa'o //
translated: This is the preliminary.

original: gnyis dngos grub bsgrub pa las nye bar bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis dngos grub bsgrub pa las nye bar bya ba'i don to //
translated: The two are the means of accomplishing the two powers.

original: de la de nyid du dbyer med ces pa ni de nyid du rang gi ngo bo nyid dbyer med do //
analyzed: de la de nyid du dbyer med ces pa ni de nyid du rang gi ngo bo nyid dbyer med do //
translated: There, ‚Äúindivisible in reality‚Äù means indivisible in his own nature.üîΩThere, the messenger is also the two kinds of adepts.

original: de la pho nya yang sgrub pa rnam ba gnyis zhes ba ni sgrub ba gnyis ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: de la pho nya yang sgrub pa rnam ba gnyis zhes ba ni sgrub ba gnyis ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: The two adepts are the accumulation of merit and the yoginƒ´.

original: spyad bzhin pas dngos grub gnyis grub pa'o //
analyzed: spyad bzhin pas dngos grub gnyis grub pa'o //
translated: By practicing them, the two powers are accomplished.üîΩHowever, the messenger is the one alone.

original: 'on kyang pho nya gcig pu kho na yin zhes pa ni gcig sgrub pa'i cha ni pho nya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang pho nya gcig pu kho na yin zhes pa ni gcig sgrub pa'i cha ni pho nya'o //
translated: The part of accomplishing the one is the messenger.

original: de'i dngos grub nye ba'i phyir zhes pa ni gzhan gyi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub nye ba'i phyir zhes pa ni gzhan gyi bshad pa'o //
translated: Because of his power, the other explains.

original: 'dir yang gzhung lhag pa yod de /
analyzed: 'dir yang gzhung lhag pa yod de /
translated: Here, there is also a remainder of the text.

original: zhing dang grub gnas na ni mkha' 'gro ma ni 'di ru 'tshog / de ru gnas la bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: zhing dang grub gnas na ni mkha' 'gro ma ni 'di ru 'tshog / de ru gnas la bzlas pa bya //
translated: one should perform repetition there,

original: zas la gcig tu spyod pa ni //
analyzed: zas la gcig tu spyod pa ni //
translated: living in the same place as the food.

original: de dang de ru rol pa gnas //
analyzed: de dang de ru rol pa gnas //
translated: The play is in this and that place.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: gzhung 'di nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhung 'di nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: One should enter into this very scripture.

original: snying por byas te zhes pa zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: snying por byas te zhes pa zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having made it essential, the fields and so forth are stated.

original: bza' ba dag la bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: bza' ba dag la bza' bar bya'o //
translated: One should eat the food in the food.

original: dbang bskur nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni rtse ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dbang bskur nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni rtse ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The yoginis who have obtained consecration are the play and so forth.

original: bla ma'i brgyud rim ni bla ma gzhan dang gzhan nas brgyud de 'ongs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i brgyud rim ni bla ma gzhan dang gzhan nas brgyud de 'ongs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The succession of gurus is the succession of gurus from one to another.

original: chu la sogs pa ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: chu la sogs pa ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par ro //
translated: Water and so forth are the intrinsic natures.

original: de yis dbang bskur ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: de yis dbang bskur ba thob pa'o //
translated: One has obtained consecration by that.

original: dbang bskur ba ni dbang bskur ba ste /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni dbang bskur ba ste /
translated: Consecration is the consecration.

original: ldan par 'os pa'i slob dpon la sogs pa'i dbang gang yin ba de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: ldan par 'os pa'i slob dpon la sogs pa'i dbang gang yin ba de ni de bzhin no //
translated: That which is fit to be possessed is the consecration of the master and so forth. That is just so.

original: slob ma zhes go bar bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma zhes go bar bya'o //
translated: One should understand disciple.

original: legs pa'i sdom ni sdom ba lags pa'o //
analyzed: legs pa'i sdom ni sdom ba lags pa'o //
translated: The good vow is the vow.

original: legs sngags zhes pa'i gzhung la ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: legs sngags zhes pa'i gzhung la ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
translated: In the text of the good mantra, the mantra is the repetition.

original: yang dag ldan zhes pa la gzhung bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dag ldan zhes pa la gzhung bzhin no //
translated: The right possession is according to the text.

original: brgyud pa thob pas pho nya mo ru yang dag bshad ces pa ni pho nya ni mdzes par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: brgyud pa thob pas pho nya mo ru yang dag bshad ces pa ni pho nya ni mdzes par brjod pa'o //
translated: The messenger is also explained as the messenger who has obtained the lineage.

original: slob ma ni chos kyi slob ma ste chos kyi khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma ni chos kyi slob ma ste chos kyi khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: The disciple is the disciple of the Dharma, who is distinguished by the Dharma.

original: 'di dag dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dag dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the inseparability of these two.

original: de nas de lta bur gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de nas de lta bur gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs so //
translated: Then, the yoginƒ´s are delighted with the yogin who has become like that.

original: ci zhig gi phyir zhes pa la phyag rgya legs sbyor dang tshul zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ci zhig gi phyir zhes pa la phyag rgya legs sbyor dang tshul zhes gsungs te /
translated: What is the reason? It is said that it is the union with the consort and the method.

original: phyag rgya dang yang dag bar sbyor ba las rnyed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i yang ye shes pa de ni bza' ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya dang yang dag bar sbyor ba las rnyed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i yang ye shes pa de ni bza' ba'o //
translated: The wisdom of the innate joy obtained from the union with the consort is the food.

original: de'i phyir dang ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir dang ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
translated: Therefore, and is for the purpose of what.

original: yang dag par gang ba'i ye shes kyi yul ni 'dir dpal he ru ka'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par gang ba'i ye shes kyi yul ni 'dir dpal he ru ka'i shes pa yin no //
translated: The object of the gnosis that is completely full is the consciousness of ≈örƒ´ Heruka here.

original: ye shes rgyu skyes yang dag rdzogs zhes pa ni rkyen med pa de shin tu ring por brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes rgyu skyes yang dag rdzogs zhes pa ni rkyen med pa de shin tu ring por brjod pa'o //
translated: The completely perfect that is born from the cause of gnosis is said to be very far from the condition.

original: dpal he ru ka nyid kyi sgom pa'i rim pa ni nang bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs @206a * //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka nyid kyi sgom pa'i rim pa ni nang bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs @206a * //
translated: The sequence of the meditation of ≈örƒ´ Heruka himself is stated with in the morning, etc.

original: te ; nang par ni snga bar ro //
analyzed: te ; nang par ni snga bar ro //
translated: In the morning is early.

original: langs pa ni mal nas langs pa'o //üîΩsems kyi bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: langs pa ni mal nas langs pa'o // sems kyi bdag nyid yin no //
translated: Having risen is having gotten up from bed.üîΩThe nature of mind is the nature of mind only.

original: sems tsam nyid kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin gang yin ba de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: sems tsam nyid kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin gang yin ba de ni de bzhin no //
translated: That which is the nature of mind only is just so.

original: de ltar ci byas nas zhes pa la lus kyi bya ba kun byas te zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar ci byas nas zhes pa la lus kyi bya ba kun byas te zhes gsungs so //
translated: Having done what in that way? Having done all bodily actions, is stated.

original: shes rab kyi mtshon gyis phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi lus kyang dum bur bye brag tu phye nas stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi mtshon gyis phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi lus kyang dum bur bye brag tu phye nas stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes dgongs so //
translated: Having also cut up with the weapon of wisdom the body that is the nature of the aggregates, etc., into pieces, one should meditate on emptiness, is the intention.

original: sngon nyid du ji lta bar song nas zhes pa la /
analyzed: sngon nyid du ji lta bar song nas zhes pa la /
translated: Having gone just as before, is stated with having gone to the charnel ground, etc.

original: yan lag shin tu'ang bstan bcos ni //
analyzed: yan lag shin tu'ang bstan bcos ni //
translated: The limbs are also taught in the treatise,

original: lus la gnas pa kun tu spyad //üîΩces gsungs so //
analyzed: lus la gnas pa kun tu spyad // ces gsungs so //
translated: and are to be placed on the body.

original: sems can la slob par byed pas na bstan bcos ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la bstan pa'i rnam ba de rnams lus la gnas pa ni mig la sogs pa la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can la slob par byed pas na bstan bcos ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la bstan pa'i rnam ba de rnams lus la gnas pa ni mig la sogs pa la dgod par bya'o //
translated: The treatise is so called because it teaches sentient beings. The aspects of the teaching are to be placed on the body, in the eyes, etc.

original: yan lag shin tu ni don dam par rang bzhin med pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag shin tu ni don dam par rang bzhin med pa'o //
translated: The limbs are extremely subtle, i.e., ultimately without intrinsic reality.

original: yang na slob ma'i rtog pa dang / sgra dang nges pa'i tshig dang / sdeb sbyor dang / brtsams pa dang rtsis zhes bya ba dang drug ni rig byed kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: yang na slob ma'i rtog pa dang / sgra dang nges pa'i tshig dang / sdeb sbyor dang / brtsams pa dang rtsis zhes bya ba dang drug ni rig byed kyi yan lag go //
translated: Or else, the six, i.e., the student‚Äôs thought, sound, etymology, prosody, grammar, and mathematics, are the limbs of the Veda.

original: de rnams gnas pa na shin tu yan lag ni des rtogs pa ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams gnas pa na shin tu yan lag ni des rtogs pa ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: When they are placed on the body, the limbs are extremely subtle, i.e., not understood by them.

original: dag byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la phung po la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i rjes su stong pa nyid du byas pas ni dag byed nyid do //
analyzed: dag byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la phung po la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i rjes su stong pa nyid du byas pas ni dag byed nyid do //
translated: As for the purification, etc., the purification is because of the emptiness that is made of the purification of the aggregates, etc.

original: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra Om svabhava-sudha sarva-dharmasvabhava-sudho 'ham.

original: de la rtag tu rnal 'byor pas brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la rtag tu rnal 'byor pas brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: There, the yogi should always recite.

original: de rgyas par rgyud sna tshogs nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rgyas par rgyud sna tshogs nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is taught in various tantras.

original: rnal 'byor gnas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas te go cha gnyis kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gnas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas te go cha gnyis kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The abode of yoga is the abode of samadhi, meaning the abode of the two armors.

original: des bstan zhes bya ba ni de'i sngags sam de las skyes pa'i lhar byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: des bstan zhes bya ba ni de'i sngags sam de las skyes pa'i lhar byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: By that, it is taught, meaning that one should consecrate oneself with that mantra or as a deity born from that.

original: 'dis kyang bsgom pa'i phyogs tsam zhig bstan te /
analyzed: 'dis kyang bsgom pa'i phyogs tsam zhig bstan te /
translated: This also teaches just a part of the meditation.

original: bstan bcos rnams ni bskom  mi bya //
analyzed: bstan bcos rnams ni bskom  mi bya //
translated: One should not meditate on the treatises.

original: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams la bsgom par mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams la bsgom par mi bya'o //
translated: This means one should not meditate on the yoginis.

original: yang na lha rnams kyi mtshan ma dang rig byed kyi tshig yin zhes kha cig zer te /
analyzed: yang na lha rnams kyi mtshan ma dang rig byed kyi tshig yin zhes kha cig zer te /
translated: Or, some say, They are the signs and Vedic words of the deities.

original: spyod pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas phyi rol pa'i don du kha cig tu bshad par bya ba'i ched du rig byed kyi tshig gi don kyang skyong bar byed do zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: spyod pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas phyi rol pa'i don du kha cig tu bshad par bya ba'i ched du rig byed kyi tshig gi don kyang skyong bar byed do zhes dgongs so //
translated: The yogi who practices the conduct also maintains the meaning of the Vedic words for the sake of explaining them to some outsiders.

original: dam tshig bstan pa khro mi bya //
analyzed: dam tshig bstan pa khro mi bya //
translated: Do not be angry with those who have commitments.

original: zhes pa ni dam tshig can spyod pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa la khro bo'i sems bskyed par mi 'os zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dam tshig can spyod pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa la khro bo'i sems bskyed par mi 'os zhes dgongs so //
translated: This means that it is not appropriate to generate an angry mind toward those who have commitments and practice the conduct.

original: mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya //
analyzed: mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya //
translated: Do not transgress the one who is diligent.

original: zhes ba ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la mngon par brtson pa zhes pa ni de mngon par bsags pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
analyzed: zhes ba ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la mngon par brtson pa zhes pa ni de mngon par bsags pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
translated: The one who is diligent in Sri Heruka is the yogi who has accumulated that.

original: bde ba ni shin tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba ni shin tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i bde ba'o //
translated: The meaning of bliss is the bliss of supreme joy and so forth.üîΩThe meaning of liberation is for the sake of that.

original: grol ba'i don dang de don du zhes pa ni grol ba'i don ni bde @206b ba'i don du yang byas pa ste /
analyzed: grol ba'i don dang de don du zhes pa ni grol ba'i don ni bde @206b ba'i don du yang byas pa ste /
translated: The meaning of liberation is also made for the sake of bliss.

original: 'dod pa'i bstan bcos nas 'byung ba bzhin byas la de dang lhan cig tu nyal lo zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i bstan bcos nas 'byung ba bzhin byas la de dang lhan cig tu nyal lo zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Having done that according to the teachings of the Kama Sutra, one should lie with her.

original: rnam 'khru ba ni rnam par rol pa yang dag par 'byung ba sbyar bar bya zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam 'khru ba ni rnam par rol pa yang dag par 'byung ba sbyar bar bya zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The word play should be connected with arising.

original: gal te bya bar 'os pa yin na bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gal te bya bar 'os pa yin na bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: If it is proper to do, then it should be done, is the meaning.

original: gal te 'dod pa la dga' na de bya'o zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: gal te 'dod pa la dga' na de bya'o zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: If one delights in desire, then it should be done, is the meaning.

original: de la mtshan mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gnas la chags pa ni nag pa'i phyogs la chags pa'o //
analyzed: de la mtshan mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gnas la chags pa ni nag pa'i phyogs la chags pa'o //
translated: There, night and so forth. Attachment to a place is attachment to a dark side.

original: mgul rgyan la sogs pa ni mi'i mgos spras pa'o //
analyzed: mgul rgyan la sogs pa ni mi'i mgos spras pa'o //
translated: Necklaces and so forth are adorned with human heads.

original: gdu bu zhes pa ni gdu bu'o //
analyzed: gdu bu zhes pa ni gdu bu'o //
translated: Bracelets are armlets.

original: tshangs skud dang ske rags skra yis spras ba dang dril bu g-yer ka dang ldan pa'i rkang rgyan de'i sgra dang lhan cig tu mgul rgyan la sogs pa 'chang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: tshangs skud dang ske rags skra yis spras ba dang dril bu g-yer ka dang ldan pa'i rkang rgyan de'i sgra dang lhan cig tu mgul rgyan la sogs pa 'chang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Wearing a sacred thread, a belt, and anklets adorned with hair, and with the sound of small bells, together with the sound of a necklace and so forth, is the meaning.

original: ral pa'i cod pan zhes pa ni ral pa'i dbu brgyan no //
analyzed: ral pa'i cod pan zhes pa ni ral pa'i dbu brgyan no //
translated: A crest of hair is a hair ornament.

original: dar dpyangs kyi mtshan ma zhes pa ni dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs so //
analyzed: dar dpyangs kyi mtshan ma zhes pa ni dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs so //
translated: A banner of silk is a hero's banner.

original: bcos ma'i skra la sogs bas brgyan zhes pa ni gzhan skra dang / rnga ma la sogs pas mdzes par byas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bcos ma'i skra la sogs bas brgyan zhes pa ni gzhan skra dang / rnga ma la sogs pas mdzes par byas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Adorned with artificial hair, etc. means beautified with the hair of others, and with the tail, etc.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i padma ste /
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i padma ste /
translated: Marked with a vajra means marked with a vajra-lotus.

original: thod pa rdo rje padma dang lhan cig tu rdo rje kha tv'am ga dang da ma ru'i sgra h'um gi rnam par gnas pa zhes pa ni de de bzhin no //
analyzed: thod pa rdo rje padma dang lhan cig tu rdo rje kha tv'am ga dang da ma ru'i sgra h'um gi rnam par gnas pa zhes pa ni de de bzhin no //
translated: The skull, the vajra, and the lotus, together with the vajra kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga and the damaru, abiding in the form of the sound H≈™·πÄ means just that.

original: dpa' bo thams cad gang yin pa de ni thams cad dba' po'i ste 'khor lo gsum ste /
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad gang yin pa de ni thams cad dba' po'i ste 'khor lo gsum ste /
translated: All heroes are all heroes, the three wheels.

original: de'i rnal 'byor ma ni rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor ma ni rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: Their yoginƒ´s are the yoginƒ´s Pracha·πá·∏çƒÅ, etc.

original: 'di rnal 'byor pa des bsgom par bya'o zhes dgongs so //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir go cha gsum gyis rnam par brgyan te /
analyzed: 'di rnal 'byor pa des bsgom par bya'o zhes dgongs so // de nyid kyi phyir go cha gsum gyis rnam par brgyan te /
translated: This is to be cultivated by that yogin, is the idea.üîΩAdorned with the three armors is just because of that.

original: 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i go cha gsum gyi bdud kyi mtshon cha bzlog par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i go cha gsum gyi bdud kyi mtshon cha bzlog par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: The three armors are to be placed on the three wheels, in order to ward off the weapons of the demons.

original: lha sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bsam pa'o //
analyzed: lha sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bsam pa'o //
translated: One should think, I am endowed with the meditation of the thirty-seven deities.

original: srog chags las byung gyon zhes pa ni pags pa'i gos gyon par bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: srog chags las byung gyon zhes pa ni pags pa'i gos gyon par bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand, I will wear the clothing made from animal skins, that is, the clothing made from the hides of animals.

original: gyon pa ni mnabs pa ste gos g-yogs so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gyon pa ni mnabs pa ste gos g-yogs so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Wearing means putting on, that is, covering oneself with the clothing.

original: ngo bo nyid la ghanya'i rkyen byin pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid la ghanya'i rkyen byin pa'o //
translated: The suffix gnya is added to the root to indicate the intrinsic nature.

original: de dang lhan cig bde ba bya zhes pa 'di rgyas par ston te /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig bde ba bya zhes pa 'di rgyas par ston te /
translated: One should think, I will act happily with that, and this is taught extensively.

original: bde don bskyod pas bde thob 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bde don bskyod pas bde thob 'gyur // zhes gsungs so //
translated: One should attain happiness by the attainment of the movement of happiness.

original: mchod phyir thogs kyang yang dang spangs //
analyzed: mchod phyir thogs kyang yang dang spangs //
translated: One should abandon the purity of the ritual bath, and so on, and the pride of the deity.

original: gtsang spra dpal he ru ka gnas zhes pa ni kyang ni ma gsungs pa yongs su bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: gtsang spra dpal he ru ka gnas zhes pa ni kyang ni ma gsungs pa yongs su bsdu ba'o //
translated: The word and includes what is not mentioned.

original: thos ba dang dran pa la sogs pa byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs pa la sogs pa bskyed pa'i gtsang sbra spangs nas dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa ni gtsang sbra zhes bsam pa'o //
analyzed: thos ba dang dran pa la sogs pa byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs pa la sogs pa bskyed pa'i gtsang sbra spangs nas dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa ni gtsang sbra zhes bsam pa'o //
translated: One should think, I will abandon the purity of the ritual bath, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the deity, and so on, which is produced by the pride of the

original: phyag rgya lnga ni rab bcings nas //üîΩdus rnams kun du rnam bar gnas //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga ni rab bcings nas // dus rnams kun du rnam bar gnas //
translated: Having bound the five symbolic ornaments,üîΩone should always remain

original: mtshan mo rtag tu gsal bar bya //
analyzed: mtshan mo rtag tu gsal bar bya //
translated: illuminating the night

original: nyin mo yang ni legs sba bya //
analyzed: nyin mo yang ni legs sba bya //
translated: and well concealed during the day.

original: zhes pa ni bya ba'i ye @207a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bya ba'i ye @207a * //
translated: This is the knowledge of action.

original: shes legs par sba /
analyzed: shes legs par sba /
translated: One should be well concealed

original: rab tu zhib ngal ba spangs //
analyzed: rab tu zhib ngal ba spangs //
translated: and very careful, abandoning fatigue.

original: gtsang spra rnam pa gsum du shes //
analyzed: gtsang spra rnam pa gsum du shes //
translated: One should know the three kinds of purity

original: rang gi rgyun gyis rnam par gnas //
analyzed: rang gi rgyun gyis rnam par gnas //
translated: and remain in one's own continuity.

original: zhes pa ni gzhung lhags pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni gzhung lhags pa ste /
translated: This is the text.

original: de la ni de'i don ni rdo rje dang rin po che dang / padma dang las dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang so sor 'brel pa dang zhes bsam pa'o //
analyzed: de la ni de'i don ni rdo rje dang rin po che dang / padma dang las dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang so sor 'brel pa dang zhes bsam pa'o //
translated: Here, its meaning is considered in relation to the vajra, jewel, lotus, action, and tathƒÅgata families.

original: mtshan mo rigs la dang so sor 'brel pa ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo rigs la dang so sor 'brel pa ni gsal ba'o //
translated: Illuminating the night is in relation to the families and their individual connections.

original: rten ma bcug pa'o //
analyzed: rten ma bcug pa'o //
translated: Not placing the support.

original: ni ni shin tu ba'i don to //
analyzed: ni ni shin tu ba'i don to //
translated: The particle is for the meaning of very.

original: de nyin mo legs par sba bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyin mo legs par sba bar bya'o //
translated: One should be well concealed during the day.

original: yang ni nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang ni nges pa'i don to //
translated: Again, it has the meaning of certainty.

original: smod cing sems can rnams kyi kha na ma tho bar gyur cing zhes pa'o //
analyzed: smod cing sems can rnams kyi kha na ma tho bar gyur cing zhes pa'o //
translated: It is censured and becomes a fault for sentient beings.

original: bya bas bstan pa'i ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyang ngo //
analyzed: bya bas bstan pa'i ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyang ngo //
translated: The wisdom taught by action is also the connate wisdom.

original: legs par sba ba ni rab tu zhi zhing snying rje dang ldan bas ngal ba las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: legs par sba ba ni rab tu zhi zhing snying rje dang ldan bas ngal ba las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
translated: Well-guarded is completely victorious over the fatigue of being compassionate and peaceful.

original: gtsang sbra de yang rnam pa gsum ni de yang zhen pa med bas 'dod chags la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gtsang sbra de yang rnam pa gsum ni de yang zhen pa med bas 'dod chags la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: That purity is also threefold: since it is nonattachment, it engages desire and so on.

original: yang na pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, since the messenger and so on will be explained below,

original: rang gi rgyun du ni rang gi sems rnam par gnas pa zhes pa'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi rgyun du ni rang gi sems rnam par gnas pa zhes pa'i bya ba'o //
translated: one's own continuum is the action of one's mind abiding.

original: mi rigs ni bram ze la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi rigs ni bram ze la sogs pa'o //
translated: Unfit is a brahmin and so on.

original: rims ma yin pa ni mthar skyes so //üîΩngor mi lta zhes pa ni gtso bor byas pa'o //
analyzed: rims ma yin pa ni mthar skyes so // ngor mi lta zhes pa ni gtso bor byas pa'o //
translated: Uninfectious is one born at the end.üîΩNot looking at is the primary one.

original: mi lta ba ni smod pa byed pas na smad de gtso bo ma yin no //
analyzed: mi lta ba ni smod pa byed pas na smad de gtso bo ma yin no //
translated: Not looking is the secondary one, since it is the one that is criticized.

original: spyi gtsug tu gtsug phud do //
analyzed: spyi gtsug tu gtsug phud do //
translated: The topknot is on the crown of the head.

original: sogs kyi sgras ni cod ban dang thal ba dang ral pa la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: sogs kyi sgras ni cod ban dang thal ba dang ral pa la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The words and so on refer to the c≈´dƒÅ, ashes, dreadlocks, and so on.

original: de rnams bcing ba ni 'chang ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams bcing ba ni 'chang ba ste /
translated: The binding of those is the holding of them.

original: de spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de spangs pa'o //
translated: That is the abandonment.

original: gtsang sbra gzhan ni pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gtsang sbra gzhan ni pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Another purification is stated by messenger, etc.

original: pho nya ni pho nya ste /
analyzed: pho nya ni pho nya ste /
translated: The messenger is the messenger.

original: thig le gcig phyis pa'o //
analyzed: thig le gcig phyis pa'o //
translated: The drop is the drop.

original: zla ba zhes pa ni zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //üîΩzas gcig ni gang de bza' ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zla ba zhes pa ni zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems so // zas gcig ni gang de bza' ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The moon is the bodhicitta.üîΩThe single food is that which is eaten, is the meaning.

original: za ba nyid ces pa ni thig le gcig phyis pa'o //
analyzed: za ba nyid ces pa ni thig le gcig phyis pa'o //
translated: The eating is the drop.

original: de yang gtsang spra gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de yang gtsang spra gsum pa'o //
translated: That is the third purification.

original: gtsang spra de yang rab tu skyong ba ni gtsang sbra dag pa ste /
analyzed: gtsang spra de yang rab tu skyong ba ni gtsang sbra dag pa ste /
translated: The protection of that purification is the purity of purification.

original: rim gyis thob nas ci'i phyir dngos grub tu mi 'gyur zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: rim gyis thob nas ci'i phyir dngos grub tu mi 'gyur zhes dgongs so //
translated: Having gradually attained that, why would there not be the attainment of the Great Seal?

original: gtsang sbra de rnams yongs su bskyang ba las gtsang spra dag pa thob pas /
analyzed: gtsang sbra de rnams yongs su bskyang ba las gtsang spra dag pa thob pas /
translated: From the protection of those purifications, having attained the purity of purification,

original: ci'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur /
analyzed: ci'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur /
translated: why would there not be the attainment of the Great Seal?

original: bde mchog ces pa ni bde mchog bla ma'o //
analyzed: bde mchog ces pa ni bde mchog bla ma'o //
translated: The supreme bliss is the supreme guru.

original: gsang ba'i rgyud ces pa ni gsang ba mdzod la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i rgyud ces pa ni gsang ba mdzod la sogs pa'o //
translated: The secret tantra is the Secret Treasury and so forth.

original: de bzhin zhes ba ni 'dzin ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes ba ni 'dzin ba med pa'o //
translated: The word just means without grasping.

original: nyid ni nye bar bzung ba'o //
analyzed: nyid ni nye bar bzung ba'o //
translated: The word itself means to take up.

original: dang po ni spyod pa bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: dang po ni spyod pa bsdu ba'o //
translated: The first is the collection of conduct.

original: brtul zhugs dang bzlas pa dang nges pa ni sogs kyi sgras dbang po'i tshar bcad pa la sogs pa de dngos grub ster ba zhes pa ni bzlas ba dang brtul zhugs la sogs pas dngos grub ster ba ni lha'o //
analyzed: brtul zhugs dang bzlas pa dang nges pa ni sogs kyi sgras dbang po'i tshar bcad pa la sogs pa de dngos grub ster ba zhes pa ni bzlas ba dang brtul zhugs la sogs pas dngos grub ster ba ni lha'o //
translated: The vow, repetition, and certainty are the vow, repetition, and so forth, which are the bestowal of power. The bestowal of power by means of repetition, vow, and so forth is the deity.

original: de nyid bsdus pa la @207b sogs pa bzlas pa la sogs pas 'grub po zhes pa ni bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid bsdus pa la @207b sogs pa bzlas pa la sogs pas 'grub po zhes pa ni bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: The accomplishment by means of the collection, and so forth, of repetition, and so forth, is the meaning of the collection.

original: 'dir ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o //
translated: Here, it is the glorious Wheel of Time.

original: dpal he ru ka'i bsam gtan nyid 'ba' zhig gis sgrub pa pos phyag rgya chen po bsgrub bo zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i bsam gtan nyid 'ba' zhig gis sgrub pa pos phyag rgya chen po bsgrub bo zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: The practitioner accomplishes the great seal just by the contemplation of the glorious Heruka. This is the thought.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sngags bas skad cig nyid la 'grub 'gyur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sngags bas skad cig nyid la 'grub 'gyur zhes bya'o //
translated: For that very reason, it is said, is accomplished in an instant by means of the mantra.

original: gtsang sgra nyid kyi phan yon ni rnal 'byor zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: gtsang sgra nyid kyi phan yon ni rnal 'byor zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The benefit of purity itself is stated by ‚Äúyoga. ‚Äù

original: sems tsam du snyoms par zhugs pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: sems tsam du snyoms par zhugs pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The yoga is the meditative equipoise on mind-only.

original: de nyid yang dag gi byang chub kyi lam de la dag pa rnams kyi nang nas 'di dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor bas gtsang sbra gong du bstan pa la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid yang dag gi byang chub kyi lam de la dag pa rnams kyi nang nas 'di dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor bas gtsang sbra gong du bstan pa la spyad par bya'o //
translated: That very [mind] is the path to true enlightenment. Among the purities, this should be practiced by the yoga of glorious Heruka, as taught above.

original: gtsang sbra'i dgos pa ni gtsang spra zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gtsang sbra'i dgos pa ni gtsang spra zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The purpose of purity is stated by ‚Äúpurity. ‚Äù

original: pho nya ni gtsang spra'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir gtsang spra'o //
analyzed: pho nya ni gtsang spra'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir gtsang spra'o //
translated: The messenger is purity because of the cause of purity.

original: de rnams gang yin pa bsod nams de kha cig gis brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: de rnams gang yin pa bsod nams de kha cig gis brjod par mi nus te /
translated: The merit of those cannot be expressed by anyone.

original: ci zhes pa la sgrub pas yon tan rgya chen po zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ci zhes pa la sgrub pas yon tan rgya chen po zhes gsungs te /
translated: What is that? It is stated by ‚Äúthe quality of accomplishment. ‚Äù

original: sgrub pa po gang gis gtsang spra'i yon tan rgyas bar nus pa ni kha ni du ma zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: sgrub pa po gang gis gtsang spra'i yon tan rgyas bar nus pa ni kha ni du ma zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The quality of accomplishment is the ability to expand the quality of purity. ‚Äú Many mouths‚Äù is stated.

original: gang yang kha mang por gyur bde'i tshe nus zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: gang yang kha mang por gyur bde'i tshe nus zhes dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that when one has many mouths, one is able.

original: rigs kyi gcig gi tshig go //
analyzed: rigs kyi gcig gi tshig go //
translated: The word ‚Äúone‚Äù is a class word.

original: gnyis pa la sogs pa yang du ma nyid ces pa la stong phrag gcig gdong zhes gsungs te /üîΩstong du bgrangs pa'i gdong ni stong gi gdong ste /
analyzed: gnyis pa la sogs pa yang du ma nyid ces pa la stong phrag gcig gdong zhes gsungs te / stong du bgrangs pa'i gdong ni stong gi gdong ste /
translated: ‚Äú Two and so on‚Äù means ‚Äúone thousand faces.‚ÄùüîΩThe ‚Äúface‚Äù is counted as one thousand.

original: gdong stong phrag ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: gdong stong phrag ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is ‚Äúone thousand faces.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir de lta bu sgrub pa po zhes bya ba la dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de lta bu sgrub pa po zhes bya ba la dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Why is it so? ‚Äú The glorious one‚Äù and so on.

original: dpal he ru ka nyid ye shes chen po'o //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka nyid ye shes chen po'o //
translated: The glorious Heruka himself is great intuition.

original: rnam dag ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam dag ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Pure‚Äù is non-affliction.

original: kun ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: kun ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú All‚Äù is the characteristic of the ten powers and so on, and that itself is the characteristic of all.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pa yang de lta bur gyur zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pa yang de lta bur gyur zhes dgongs so //
translated: Thus, the yogin becomes like that.

original: sgrub pa po zhes pa ni gang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa po zhes pa ni gang gi phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú The practitioner‚Äù is the reason.

original: sgrub pa po'i bde ba'i chu ni byang chub kyi sems de 'thung ba ni bdag nyid gnyis med kyi sbyor bas bde ba'i chu 'thung ba ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i bde ba'i chu ni byang chub kyi sems de 'thung ba ni bdag nyid gnyis med kyi sbyor bas bde ba'i chu 'thung ba ste /
translated: The water of the practitioner‚Äôs bliss is the bodhicitta. Drinking that is drinking the water of bliss by means of the yoga of non-dual union.

original: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ni sdig pa kun las grol lo zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ni sdig pa kun las grol lo zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The one who is of the nature of nondual union is freed from all sins.

original: ci'i phyir zhes pa la dag byed sdig pa nyams byed ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes pa la dag byed sdig pa nyams byed ces gsungs te /
translated: As to why, it is said, ‚Äúthe purifier, the destroyer of sins.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir bde ba'i chu de lta bur gyur pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bde ba'i chu de lta bur gyur pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because of that, the meaning is that it is such a water of bliss.

original: reg ba dang ni smra bas kyang //
analyzed: reg ba dang ni smra bas kyang //
translated: By touching and speaking,

original: zhes pa ni sgrub pa po dang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sgrub pa po dang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that it is the practitioner.

original: mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad ni lus ngag skyon ni med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad ni lus ngag skyon ni med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: All sins, such as the five heinous acts, are called ‚Äúthe fault of body and speech.‚Äù

original: skyon med pa nyid kyi phyir lus ngag pa zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: skyon med pa nyid kyi phyir lus ngag pa zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: Because of being without fault, it should be understood that it is the body and speech.

original: mnyam par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i chu la mi zhes bya ste go sla'o //
analyzed: mnyam par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i chu la mi zhes bya ste go sla'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne who practices equally‚Äù is one who drinks the water of bliss. The meaning is easy to understand.

original: skye @208a * //
analyzed: skye @208a * //
translated: In birth after birth,

original: zhing skye bar ni skye ba nas skye bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye ba'o //
analyzed: zhing skye bar ni skye ba nas skye bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye ba'o //
translated: in birth after birth, one is born into the family of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de ltar rtag tu mchod ces pa ni rnal 'byor ma mchod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar rtag tu mchod ces pa ni rnal 'byor ma mchod par bya ba ste /
translated: Thus, ‚Äúalways worship‚Äù is the worship of the yoginƒ´.

original: gtor ma sbyin par bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gtor ma sbyin par bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should give the sacrificial cake.üîΩAnd when should one give?

original: de yang gang gi tshe sbyin zhes pa la sbyin gsungs te /
analyzed: de yang gang gi tshe sbyin zhes pa la sbyin gsungs te /
translated: He says:

original: gtor ma bya'o //
analyzed: gtor ma bya'o //
translated: One should give the sacrificial cake.

original: ci 'dod ni rang ci 'dod pa'i zhi ba'i las la sogs pa'i cho ga 'di dang rgyud gzhan nas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ci 'dod ni rang ci 'dod pa'i zhi ba'i las la sogs pa'i cho ga 'di dang rgyud gzhan nas gsungs pa'o //
translated: What is desired is the rite of pacifying, etc., whatever one desires, as taught in this Tantra and in other Tantras.

original: mchod pa'i dus kyi khyad par ni //
analyzed: mchod pa'i dus kyi khyad par ni //
translated: The special time for worship is

original: nag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
analyzed: nag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
translated: stated by the words on the fourteenth day of the dark half of the month, etc.

original: 'am gyi sgras ni dgu dang bcu bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'am gyi sgras ni dgu dang bcu bzhi'o //
translated: The word or indicates the ninth and the fourteenth.

original: ni ni khyad par gyi don nam bsdu ba'i don to //
analyzed: ni ni khyad par gyi don nam bsdu ba'i don to //
translated: The word also has the sense of distinction or inclusion.

original: nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi dang dkar po'i phyogs la ni gzhung gzhan te /
analyzed: nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi dang dkar po'i phyogs la ni gzhung gzhan te /
translated: The fourteenth day of the dark half of the month and the bright half of the month are the other texts.

original: ni'i sgras ni bcu dang dgu bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgras ni bcu dang dgu bsdu ba'o //
translated: The word also includes the tenth and the ninth.

original: lhag ma gang zhes pa ni gang bcu dang dgur gyur pa'am bcu bzhi'i bar du mchod pa bya ste /
analyzed: lhag ma gang zhes pa ni gang bcu dang dgur gyur pa'am bcu bzhi'i bar du mchod pa bya ste /
translated: Whatever remains means that one should worship up to the tenth and the ninth, up to the fourteenth.

original: bcu dang / dgu la yang ngo //
analyzed: bcu dang / dgu la yang ngo //
translated: It is also the tenth and the ninth.

original: de bzhin ci zhes pa la myur du 'bad pas mchod pa ni chang dang shas kyang rdo rje lha mo la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin ci zhes pa la myur du 'bad pas mchod pa ni chang dang shas kyang rdo rje lha mo la'o //
translated: Likewise, one should worship the Vajra Goddess with beer and meat, quickly striving in whatever way is appropriate.

original: de mchod cing gus pa dang ldan pa'i skye 'gro dpal he ru ka la mngon par dga' ba de thugs mnyes nas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de mchod cing gus pa dang ldan pa'i skye 'gro dpal he ru ka la mngon par dga' ba de thugs mnyes nas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That person who is devoted to worshiping her, and who delights in Sri Heruka, will be pleased by him and will grant the supreme.

original: de'i lag gnas mchog gang yin pa ni myur bar tshes rnams la 'bad pas mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i lag gnas mchog gang yin pa ni myur bar tshes rnams la 'bad pas mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship with effort on the lunar days that are in the hand of that [Goddess],

original: lag pa na gnas pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: lag pa na gnas pa'i mchog go //
translated: the supreme one who is in the hand.

original: mchog ni yid la 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni yid la 'dod pa'o //
translated: The supreme is what is desired in the mind.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: spyod pa dang brtul zhugs dang mchod pa dang gtor ma brjod pa gang yin pa de ni le'u yin bas de de bzhin no //
analyzed: spyod pa dang brtul zhugs dang mchod pa dang gtor ma brjod pa gang yin pa de ni le'u yin bas de de bzhin no //
translated: That which is stated as conduct, observances, worship, and sacrifice is the chapter, thus it is so.

original: nyi shu rtsa bdun ni nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bdun ni nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The twenty-seventh is the twenty-seventh.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
translated: This is the commentary on the twenty-seventh chapter of the glorious Sri Heruka Tantra.

original: // / mnyam pa nyid kyi le'u ni de nas mchod pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: // / mnyam pa nyid kyi le'u ni de nas mchod pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: The chapter on equality is stated as then the worship.

original: de nas kyi sgras ni de phyir gyi don du lta ba'am bde bar gshegs pa'i lung yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgras ni de phyir gyi don du lta ba'am bde bar gshegs pa'i lung yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúthen‚Äù means ‚Äúfor that reason‚Äù or ‚Äúbecause of the scriptures of the Sugata.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir mnyam pa nyid med par yang dag pa'i byang chub tu mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir bdag nyid phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa dag gis mchod do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mnyam pa nyid med par yang dag pa'i byang chub tu mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir bdag nyid phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa dag gis mchod do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Since without sameness there is no perfect enlightenment, therefore one should worship oneself with outer and inner offerings.

original: rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems 'di ni de rnam dag bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems 'di ni de rnam dag bdag nyid do //
translated: This mind, which is of the nature of purity, is the nature of that purity.

original: ji lta bur gyur pa'i rnam dag bdag nyid ces pa la /
analyzed: ji lta bur gyur pa'i rnam dag bdag nyid ces pa la /
translated: What is the nature of purity like?

original: mya ngan 'das nges 'byung dpa' bo zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: mya ngan 'das nges 'byung dpa' bo zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is said to be ‚Äúthe hero who definitely arises from nirvana.‚Äù

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba ste blo'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba ste blo'o //
translated: Nirvana is the intellect of the joy of the separation from joy.

original: phyi rol gyi yul la dmigs pa'i phyir de nas de'i rjes la nges par 'byung zhing gnas pa de la mchod ces bya ste /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi yul la dmigs pa'i phyir de nas de'i rjes la nges par 'byung zhing gnas pa de la mchod ces bya ste /
translated: Since it is the object of external observation, after that, it definitely arises and abides. It is said to be ‚Äúworship.‚Äù

original: sgrub pa po'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i mchod pa'o //
translated: It is the worship of the practitioner.

original: bdag nyid kyi sems @208b lhan cig skyes par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi sems @208b lhan cig skyes par gnas pa'o //
translated: One‚Äôs own mind abides as connate.

original: yang na dpe med pa nyid kyis lhan cig skyes par 'gro ba ni 'gro ba dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: yang na dpe med pa nyid kyis lhan cig skyes par 'gro ba ni 'gro ba dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Or, since it is without example, it is coemergent, which is to say, it is endowed with movement.

original: rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Or, by the very absence of an example, the one who goes is the one who has gone, who has the nature of realization.

original: gdams ngag med par dga' bral gyi dga' ba la blo ma sbyangs bas dga' bral gyi dga' ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi sngon du ston te /
analyzed: gdams ngag med par dga' bral gyi dga' ba la blo ma sbyangs bas dga' bral gyi dga' ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi sngon du ston te /
translated: Without instruction, the mind is not trained in the joy of separation from joy, and the joy of separation is taught prior to the gnosis of the connate joy.

original: blo ma sbyangs pas bzhad gad kyang byed do //
analyzed: blo ma sbyangs pas bzhad gad kyang byed do //
translated: Since the mind is untrained, there is even laughter.

original: des kyang dga' bral ni byang chub kyi sems ltung ba la go ste /
analyzed: des kyang dga' bral ni byang chub kyi sems ltung ba la go ste /
translated: By that, the joy of separation is understood as the falling of bodhicitta.

original: bdag nyid brlag par byed do //
analyzed: bdag nyid brlag par byed do //
translated: It destroys itself.üîΩBy that, the connate joy is not found.

original: des 'di ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nye bar mi rnyed do zhig cig / rang gi sems bsrung ba'i don du me la rtse bya'o //
analyzed: des 'di ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nye bar mi rnyed do zhig cig / rang gi sems bsrung ba'i don du me la rtse bya'o //
translated: For the sake of protecting one‚Äôs mind, one should play with fire.

original: des cir 'gyur zhes pa la /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhes pa la /
translated: What happens by that?

original: kun zhes bya ba la sogs ga gsungs te /
analyzed: kun zhes bya ba la sogs ga gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúEverything‚Äù and so on is stated.

original: kun ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kun ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEverything‚Äù refers to the buddhas and so on.

original: mchod pa ni mchod par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mchod pa ni mchod par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúWorship‚Äù means they will be worshipped.

original: sangs rgyas kun sogs ni dang po'i mang po'i tshig phyis pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun sogs ni dang po'i mang po'i tshig phyis pa'o //
translated: The all buddhas and so forth is the past form of the first plural particle.

original: mchod pa zhes pa ni aa yig thung bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa zhes pa ni aa yig thung bar byas pa'o //
translated: The worship is the short vowel a.üîΩThe buddhas are those whose nature is the realization of the exalted wisdom of the innate joy.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas te /
translated: The all buddhas and so forth is the past form of the first plural particle.üîΩThe worship is the short vowel a.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa 'grub po ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa 'grub po ;
translated: The buddhas are those whose nature is the realization of the exalted wisdom of the innate joy.

original: / sangs rgyas kun sogs mchod bar bya //
analyzed: / sangs rgyas kun sogs mchod bar bya //
translated: The all buddhas and so forth is the past form of the first plural particle.

original: zhes pa ni gzhung gzhan no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gzhung gzhan no //
translated: The worship is the short vowel a.üîΩThe buddhas are those whose nature is the realization of the exalted wisdom of the innate joy.üîΩThe all buddhas and so forth is the past form of the first plural particle.

original: sangs rgyas kun la sogs par skye ba ni mchod par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //üîΩ'on kyang thams cad nyid sangs rgyas zhes pa la thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun la sogs par skye ba ni mchod par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o // 'on kyang thams cad nyid sangs rgyas zhes pa la thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The worship is the short vowel a.üîΩThe buddhas are those whose nature is the realization of the exalted wisdom of the innate joy.üîΩThe all buddhas and so forth is the past form of the first plural particle.

original: dpa' bo thams cad ces pa ni sgra dang po'i mang po'i tshig go //üîΩbrtan pa ni shing gi sdong po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad ces pa ni sgra dang po'i mang po'i tshig go // brtan pa ni shing gi sdong po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The worship is the short vowel a.üîΩThe buddhas are those whose nature is the realization of the exalted wisdom of the innate joy.üîΩThe all buddhas and so forth is the past form of the first plural particle.

original: g-yo ba ni mi la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba ni mi la sogs pa'o //
translated: The worship is the short vowel a.üîΩThe buddhas are those whose nature is the realization of the exalted wisdom of the innate joy.üîΩThe all buddhas and so forth is the past form of the first plural particle.üîΩThe worship is the short vowel a.

original: 'di ni de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'o //
translated: The buddhas are those whose nature is the realization of the exalted wisdom of the innate joy.üîΩThe all buddhas and so forth is the past form of the first plural particle.

original: spun dang spyod ni mchod par bya //
analyzed: spun dang spyod ni mchod par bya //
translated: The worship is the short vowel a.üîΩThe buddhas are those whose nature is the realization of the exalted wisdom of the innate joy.üîΩThe all buddhas and so forth is the past form of the first plural particle.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: The worship is the short vowel a.üîΩThe buddhas are those whose nature is the realization

original: ni ni bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: ni ni bsdus pa'o //
translated: ni is for the sake of including.

original: chos lhan cig tu thos pa ni spun no //
analyzed: chos lhan cig tu thos pa ni spun no //
translated: Dharma-hearing together is the brother.

original: spyod pa ni 'dir rang gi lung la gnas pa nyid spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni 'dir rang gi lung la gnas pa nyid spyod pa'o //
translated: Here, the practice is the very abiding in one's own scripture.

original: zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The moon is the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: 'dus ba ni /
analyzed: 'dus ba ni /
translated: The assembly is

original: sbyor ba ste de mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ste de mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'o //
translated: the union, which is the abiding in equality.

original: zla ba'i 'dus pa yang dag gnas ni sgra gnyis kyi dang po'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'dus pa yang dag gnas ni sgra gnyis kyi dang po'o //
translated: The abiding of the assembly of the moon is the first of the two words.

original: des kyang mchod par bya'o zhes ba'i don to //
analyzed: des kyang mchod par bya'o zhes ba'i don to //
translated: By that, one should make offerings.

original: spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu //
translated: With brothers and sons together,

original: bde dang sdug bsngal yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal yang dag 'byung //
translated: there is the arising of happiness and suffering.

original: ye shes de la bstan mi bya //
analyzed: ye shes de la bstan mi bya //
translated: That wisdom should not be taught.

original: zhes bya ba ni spun de rnams la ye shes bstan par mi bya'o //üîΩzhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spun de rnams la ye shes bstan par mi bya'o // zhes sbyar ro //
translated: This means that that wisdom should not be taught to those brothers.

original: spun dang bu rnams ni gcig tu yid la 'dod par shes pa mnyam pas lhan cig pa'o //
analyzed: spun dang bu rnams ni gcig tu yid la 'dod par shes pa mnyam pas lhan cig pa'o //
translated: The brothers and sons are together because they have the same understanding of what is desired in the mind.

original: 'on kyang dpe 'dir bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang dag par 'byung ba gang yin pa shes pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang dpe 'dir bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang dag par 'byung ba gang yin pa shes pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: However, in this example, that wisdom which is the arising of happiness and suffering is just so.

original: de lta na yang de dag gis mi gos te /
analyzed: de lta na yang de dag gis mi gos te /
translated: Nevertheless, they are not defiled by them,

original: bde ba'i gnas skabs ni sdug bsngal gyi yan lag tu @209a * //üîΩ'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba'i gnas skabs ni sdug bsngal gyi yan lag tu @209a * // 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the state of happiness is a limb of suffering.

original: thun mong yin yang thun mong ma yin bar mkhas pa nyid kyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thun mong yin yang thun mong ma yin bar mkhas pa nyid kyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And although they are common, they are to be realized by the wise through their uncommonness.

original: don dam par bstan par bya ba ma yin te de ni bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par bstan par bya ba ma yin te de ni bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are not to be taught in the ultimate sense, because that cannot be taught.

original: bdag nyid kyi gzhung lugs las 'jug pa ni lhad 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi gzhung lugs las 'jug pa ni lhad 'jug pa'o //
translated: To introduce one‚Äôs own system is to introduce a fraud.

original: las dang 'bras bu la sogs pa thams cad sun 'byin pa ni thams cad sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: las dang 'bras bu la sogs pa thams cad sun 'byin pa ni thams cad sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: To repudiate all such things as action and effect is to repudiate everything.

original: de dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is intended that they are not to be taught to them.

original: gang gi phyir de dang shin tu lhan cig gnas pa ni rang bzhin mthun pa'i phyir smod par byed pas dmyal bar 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dang shin tu lhan cig gnas pa ni rang bzhin mthun pa'i phyir smod par byed pas dmyal bar 'gro ba'o //
translated: Because they are in complete agreement with them, they are of like nature, and so they are reproved and go to hell.

original: de ni slob ma byed pa yin yang 'os pa ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni slob ma byed pa yin yang 'os pa ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as not being proper even for a disciple.

original: don gzhan brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: don gzhan brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now another topic is to be stated.

original: yun ni dga' ba yin te /
analyzed: yun ni dga' ba yin te /
translated: The duration is the joy.

original: chos kyi brdar byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi brdar byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the sign of the Dharma.

original: bu ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: bu ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
translated: The son is the supreme joy.
