original: lhan cig ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
translated: The together is the joy of the separation from joy.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal las yang dag par byung bar gnas pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal las yang dag par byung bar gnas pa de bzhin te /
translated: The abiding in the arising from happiness and suffering is just so.

original: 'di ni lhan cig skyes dga' ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lhan cig skyes dga' ba'o //
translated: This is the innate joy.

original: de la lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni byed pa po ste /
analyzed: de la lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni byed pa po ste /
translated: In that, the innate intuition is the agent.

original: bstan par mi bya ba ni bstan par bya ba byed ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan par mi bya ba ni bstan par bya ba byed ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is not to be taught, because it is the teaching of the teaching.

original: bdag nyid kyis kyang mi ston te rang nyid la byed pa 'ga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis kyang mi ston te rang nyid la byed pa 'ga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not taught by oneself, because there is no action of itself upon itself.

original: 'di ni dgos pa yin 'di ni dgos pa min zhes bye brag tu byed pa ni lhad 'dzud pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dgos pa yin 'di ni dgos pa min zhes bye brag tu byed pa ni lhad 'dzud pa'o //
translated: The distinction, ‚ÄúThis is the purpose, this is not the purpose,‚Äù is the insertion of a flaw.

original: thams cad sun 'byin pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: thams cad sun 'byin pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs so //
translated: The refutation of everything is the mass of afflictions such as passion.

original: lus la sogs pa thams cad de la ma yin pa zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid la zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa thams cad de la ma yin pa zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid la zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The phrase not in the body, etc., means in the characteristic of innate pristine awareness.

original: 'di nyid yang dang yang du rnam par bshad pa ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid yang dang yang du rnam par bshad pa ste /
translated: This very [pristine awareness] is explained again and again,

original: 'di nyid skyes bu'i don mchog tu sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid skyes bu'i don mchog tu sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the very means of accomplishing the highest human goal.

original: zas zhes pa la dag byed ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: zas zhes pa la dag byed ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: As for the word food, the purifying [food] is the five nectars.

original: spyod pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: spyod pa zhes pa la /
translated: As for the word conduct:

original: rtag tu dam tshig spyod byas 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu dam tshig spyod byas 'gyur //
translated: one should always practice the commitments.

original: zhes pa ni ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni ;
translated: This is what is said.

original: dam tshig ni go ku da ha na ni mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dam tshig ni go ku da ha na ni mtshan nyid do //
translated: Commitments are the characteristics of cow, buffalo, and ass.

original: rgya gang gis zhes pa la rtag tu zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rgya gang gis zhes pa la rtag tu zhes gsungs te /
translated: As for the question by what seal? it is said always.

original: rtag tu ni rtag par de rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ni rtag par de rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'o //
translated: Always means constantly, and that is the abandonment of conceptualization.

original: rgyu'i stobs kyi sgra'i gsum pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i stobs kyi sgra'i gsum pa'o //
translated: The third [line] is the power of the cause.

original: gang gi phyir sngags dang nor bu dang sman gyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngags dang nor bu dang sman gyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: Because the power of mantra, jewel, and medicine is inconceivable.

original: sngags ni sngags la sogs pa gang ci yang rung ba sa'i bdag po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni sngags la sogs pa gang ci yang rung ba sa'i bdag po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Mantra is whatever mantra, etc., is appropriate, such as lord of the earth, etc.

original: man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya //
analyzed: man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya //
translated: Do not violate the esoteric instructions.

original: zhes pa ni lan cig tsam gsol ba btab pa la sred pa'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba la sogs pa mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lan cig tsam gsol ba btab pa la sred pa'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba la sogs pa mi bya ba'o //
translated: This means that one should not confer initiation, etc. out of greed for the mere recitation of a mantra.

original: don ji lta ba'i gdams ngag dam tshig dang ldan pa la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: don ji lta ba'i gdams ngag dam tshig dang ldan pa la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: One should give the esoteric instructions according to reality to one who is endowed with the commitments.

original: de'i phyir na sgra ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir na sgra ni khyad par ro //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is a specification.

original: pho nya mo ni dam tshig dang ldan @209b pa'o ;
analyzed: pho nya mo ni dam tshig dang ldan @209b pa'o ;
translated: The ‚Äúmessenger‚Äù is endowed with the commitments.

original: / dang ni bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: / dang ni bsdus pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAnd‚Äù is inclusive.

original: ni ni nye bar bzung ba'o //
analyzed: ni ni nye bar bzung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBut‚Äù is a restriction.

original: 'dir 'dod pa la rmongs pas 'dod pa'i khyad par 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'dod pa la rmongs pas 'dod pa'i khyad par 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: Here, one should not go to a particular place out of delusion for sensual pleasures.

original: pho nya mo bsrung rtag thar pa //
analyzed: pho nya mo bsrung rtag thar pa //
translated: The messenger should always be protected for liberation.

original: zhes pa ni pho nya ni phyi rol gyi yan lag can no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni pho nya ni phyi rol gyi yan lag can no //
translated: The ‚Äúmessenger‚Äù is the external limb.

original: bsrung ba ni go cha bya'o //
analyzed: bsrung ba ni go cha bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúProtection‚Äù is the armor.

original: de yis thams cad mngon bar zhen pa zhi bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yis thams cad mngon bar zhen pa zhi bar bya ba'o //
translated: By that, all attachment is to be pacified.

original: yang na pho nya dbang du bya ste /
analyzed: yang na pho nya dbang du bya ste /
translated: Or else, the messenger is to be brought under control,

original: gzhan la mi 'gro bar bya'o zhes pa ni pho nya srung ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan la mi 'gro bar bya'o zhes pa ni pho nya srung ba'o //
translated: and not to go elsewhere. This is the protection of the messenger.

original: de nas thar pa'i rtag tu de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brang pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas thar pa'i rtag tu de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brang pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Then, because of always following reality, one is liberated.

original: gzhan gyi lhag ma bza' mi bya //
analyzed: gzhan gyi lhag ma bza' mi bya //
translated: One should not eat the leftovers of others.

original: zhes ba'i tshig la sogs pa kha cig zer ro //
analyzed: zhes ba'i tshig la sogs pa kha cig zer ro //
translated: Some say this is the meaning of the words.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa'i pho nya mo rnams la gsal por bstan pa bsrung ba yin no zhes zar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa'i pho nya mo rnams la gsal por bstan pa bsrung ba yin no zhes zar ro //
translated: The messenger who is born into the Tathagata family should be taught this clearly.

original: 'bad ba yis kyang longs spyod bya //
analyzed: 'bad ba yis kyang longs spyod bya //
translated: One should enjoy with effort.

original: zhes pa ni pho nya gus pas bzung ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni pho nya gus pas bzung ste /
translated: The messenger is respectfully received.

original: de dang lhan cig bde ba byed pa'i dus gus pa ma yin bya bar shes so //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig bde ba byed pa'i dus gus pa ma yin bya bar shes so //
translated: One should know that the time for making love with her is not a time of respect.

original: nu ma bzung ba la sogs pas kyang de dga' ba'i bde ba la longs spyod par bya'o //üîΩde'i phyir / bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
analyzed: nu ma bzung ba la sogs pas kyang de dga' ba'i bde ba la longs spyod par bya'o // de'i phyir / bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
translated: One should enjoy the pleasure of her bliss by holding her breasts and so forth.üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: One should not serve her.

original: stobs kyis mnan la longs spyad de //
analyzed: stobs kyis mnan la longs spyad de //
translated: One should enjoy by overpowering her with one's strength.

original: de ni bsnyen bkur snod ma yin //üîΩzhes pa'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: de ni bsnyen bkur snod ma yin // zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
translated: She is not a vessel for service.

original: skye dman bde la longs spyad bya //
analyzed: skye dman bde la longs spyad bya //
translated: One should enjoy the pleasure of the inferior.

original: zhes bya'o // dngos grub gang las zhes pa la ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dngos grub gang las zhes pa la ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: From the mother, etc.

original: gang gi tshe ma la sogs pa bzhin du brtse bar gyur pa ni de'i tshe grub po zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ma la sogs pa bzhin du brtse bar gyur pa ni de'i tshe grub po zhes dgongs so //
translated: When one becomes affectionate like a mother, etc. , then one is successful, is the idea.üîΩBut when one is crooked, then one‚Äôs power is crooked.

original: gang gi tshe yang 'khyog bar gyur na de'i dngos grub kyang 'khyog por 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir dka' thub zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang 'khyog bar gyur na de'i dngos grub kyang 'khyog por 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir dka' thub zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to demonstrate this, he says ‚Äúasceticism,‚Äù etc.

original: thog ma med pa'i dus nas byas pa'i dka' thub de yis zad par byed do //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i dus nas byas pa'i dka' thub de yis zad par byed do //
translated: That asceticism which has been practiced since beginningless time, that he destroys.üîΩWhy?

original: ci'i phyir zhes pa la 'khyog pa'am zhes gsungs te'am ni gang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes pa la 'khyog pa'am zhes gsungs te'am ni gang gi phyir ro //
translated: Because of crookedness, or because of crookedness of the messenger‚Äôs heart.

original: gang gi phyir pho nya mo'i snying 'khyog na de bzhin du dngos grub kyang 'khyog par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni kha phyir bltas par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir pho nya mo'i snying 'khyog na de bzhin du dngos grub kyang 'khyog par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni kha phyir bltas par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because of the crookedness of the messenger‚Äôs heart, power is also crooked, i.e., turned outward.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i pho nya mo ci zhes pa la 'gugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i pho nya mo ci zhes pa la 'gugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The one who is called ‚Äúsummoning‚Äù and so forth.

original: mchog gi byang chub kyi sems brtul zhugs gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mchog gi byang chub kyi sems brtul zhugs gang yin pa'o //
translated: She is the one who is the commitment of the supreme bodhicitta.

original: de'i phyir lhan cig tu ni lhag par ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir lhan cig tu ni lhag par ro //
translated: Therefore, together with her, one should be especially

original: de lta bu'i rdzas ni nges pa yin zhes pa ni rdzas ni byang chub kyi sems de khan ma tho ba med par blang ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rdzas ni nges pa yin zhes pa ni rdzas ni byang chub kyi sems de khan ma tho ba med par blang ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: committed to her, that is, one should take up that bodhicitta without transgression.

original: 'jig rten la rtag g-yon nas spyod /
analyzed: 'jig rten la rtag g-yon nas spyod /
translated: One should always practice in the world with the left.

original: rkang pa g-yon pa sdun  nas 'dor //
analyzed: rkang pa g-yon pa sdun  nas 'dor //
translated: One should cast off with the left foot first.

original: zhes pa ni go sla'o //üîΩlag pa g-yon pa yongs su bsgyur //
analyzed: zhes pa ni go sla'o // lag pa g-yon pa yongs su bsgyur //
translated: This is easy to understand.üîΩOne should turn with the left hand.

original: g-yon gyi lag pa brtan 'gyur te //
analyzed: g-yon gyi lag pa brtan 'gyur te //
translated: The left hand is firm.

original: lus kyi rnam pa yongs su bsgyur //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam pa yongs su bsgyur //
translated: One should turn the form of the body.

original: g-yon bas steng du rab mchod bya //
analyzed: g-yon bas steng du rab mchod bya //
translated: One should worship above with the left.

original: zhes pa ni steng gi sgra ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni steng gi sgra ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúabove‚Äù here is the vajra.

original: @210a * // des rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi bsam pa zhes pa ni mchod par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: @210a * // des rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi bsam pa zhes pa ni mchod par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: By that, the yoginƒ´s‚Äô intention is the yogin who is the worshipper.

original: g-yon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The left, etc., are easy to understand.

original: brtul zhugs med 'joms brtul zhugs rdzogs pa ni bram ze la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs ni brtul zhugs med pa'o //
analyzed: brtul zhugs med 'joms brtul zhugs rdzogs pa ni bram ze la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs ni brtul zhugs med pa'o //
translated: The destroyer of the non-vow, the perfection of the vow, is the non-vow of the brahmin, etc.

original: dam tshig la sogs pa spyod pa nges par byas shing lha bsgom pa la sogs pa 'bang de byas pas 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig la sogs pa spyod pa nges par byas shing lha bsgom pa la sogs pa 'bang de byas pas 'joms pa'o //
translated: The destroyer is the one who has definitely practiced the conduct of the commitments, etc., and has done the service of meditation on the deity, etc.

original: dam tshig ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: The commitment is the yoginƒ´.

original: rigs kyi spyod pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi spyod pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: The conduct of the family is the conduct of the innate.

original: yul gyi phyogs kha cig tu bza' ba la longs spyad pa'o //
analyzed: yul gyi phyogs kha cig tu bza' ba la longs spyad pa'o //
translated: In some places, the object is the enjoyment of food.

original: rigs lnga la ni kun spyod spyad //
analyzed: rigs lnga la ni kun spyod spyad //
translated: One should practice the conduct in all five families.

original: ces pa ni rigs lnga la mnyam par spyad pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni rigs lnga la mnyam par spyad pa'o //
translated: This is the practice of equality in the five families.

original: ci gang gi phyir /
analyzed: ci gang gi phyir /
translated: Why is it so?

original: rigs ni rnam pa bzhir grags min //
analyzed: rigs ni rnam pa bzhir grags min //
translated: The families are not known to be of four kinds.

original: zhes pa ni rigs bzhi yod pa ma yin ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rigs bzhi yod pa ma yin ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor yin te /
translated: Just as there are not four families, so too there is no yoga,

original: 'jig rten pas brtags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pas brtags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is just a mundane imputation.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi nang du grags pa ni sngags pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi nang du grags pa ni sngags pa'o //
translated: The yogi/nis who are thus renowned among themselves are mantrin/s.

original: yang na rigs bzhi po gang yin ba de ni de bzhin te /
analyzed: yang na rigs bzhi po gang yin ba de ni de bzhin te /
translated: Or else, whatever the four clans are, that is so.

original: rigs bzhi ni zhal bzhi ste dpal he ru ka nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs bzhi ni zhal bzhi ste dpal he ru ka nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The four clans are the four faces, because of the very yoga of glorious Heruka.

original: lung yin pa'i phyir aur byas pa'o //
analyzed: lung yin pa'i phyir aur byas pa'o //
translated: It is the scripture, because it is the Ur-text.

original: gang gi phyir rigs bzhi bo ma yin pa nyid ces pa la gsungs pa rigs rnams gcig tu ste mnyam par spyod pa nges pa gang yin ba de rigs gcig la mnyam par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rigs bzhi bo ma yin pa nyid ces pa la gsungs pa rigs rnams gcig tu ste mnyam par spyod pa nges pa gang yin ba de rigs gcig la mnyam par spyod pa ste /
translated: Because of the statement not of the four clans, the one who is definite in the conduct of the clans as one, as equal, is the one who conducts himself equally in the one clan.

original: dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor bas kyang rigs gcig mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa ni zhal bzhi'i kha dog go zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor bas kyang rigs gcig mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa ni zhal bzhi'i kha dog go zhes dgongs so //
translated: The one who is purified in the conduct equally in the one clan by the yoga of glorious Heruka is the color of the four faces, is the idea.

original: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la gnod pa byed ba nyams pa la 'jigs pa'i ched du las rab tu rgyas pa ni /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la gnod pa byed ba nyams pa la 'jigs pa'i ched du las rab tu rgyas pa ni /
translated: For the sake of fear of the downfall of harming the Three Jewels, etc., the extensive rite is stated:

original: ba lang sha dang zhes bya ba la sogs ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ba lang sha dang zhes bya ba la sogs ba gsungs so //
translated: the flesh of the cow, etc.

original: sbyin sreg gi cho gar gsungs pa'i cho gas thab khung la sogs pa rjes su gnas la mngon spyod la sogs ba la nye bar mkho ba'i tsha ba'i mar nag la sogs pas me rab tu spar te /
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi cho gar gsungs pa'i cho gas thab khung la sogs pa rjes su gnas la mngon spyod la sogs ba la nye bar mkho ba'i tsha ba'i mar nag la sogs pas me rab tu spar te /
translated: Having purified the hearth, etc. with the rite taught in the rite of the burnt offering, one should light the fire with the kindling wood, etc. necessary for the rite of assault, etc.

original: du ma skyas ma g-yas pa'i sna bug nas nang du rab tu zhugs te /
analyzed: du ma skyas ma g-yas pa'i sna bug nas nang du rab tu zhugs te /
translated: [The fire] is entered through the right nostril of the victim in the form of a black snake.

original: bshang ba'i lam nas phyir phyung la rdo rje lcags kyu dang gri gug gi mtshan ma 'dzin par bsam mo //
analyzed: bshang ba'i lam nas phyir phyung la rdo rje lcags kyu dang gri gug gi mtshan ma 'dzin par bsam mo //
translated: Having come out through the anus, one should imagine that [the victim] holds the signs of the vajra hook and the curved knife.

original: bsgrub bya gcer du myos par gyur ba bkug la de nyid kyis de bum bur byas par rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya gcer du myos par gyur ba bkug la de nyid kyis de bum bur byas par rnam par bsams la /
translated: Having summoned the victim, who is rendered senseless with fear, one should imagine that he is cut to pieces with that [knife].

original: phyugs kyi sha la sogs pa de'i sha'o zhes blos brtan bor bya'o //
analyzed: phyugs kyi sha la sogs pa de'i sha'o zhes blos brtan bor bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the flesh, etc. of the victim is the flesh, etc. of an animal.

original: khro bo chen po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas byas na dkrol nas gsod par byed do //
analyzed: khro bo chen po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas byas na dkrol nas gsod par byed do //
translated: If one performs [the rite] with the pride of being the Great Wrathful One, one will kill by merely reciting [the mantra].

original: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: One should perform the burnt offering with the root mantra.

original: sna tshogs pa la khyim bya la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa la khyim bya la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the case of the various [kinds of victims], they are a cock, etc.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin can gyi phyi rol gyi yan lag can de dang lhan @210b cig tu longs spyad na dpa' bo de rab tu bsngags pa yin no zhes pa la sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin can gyi phyi rol gyi yan lag can de dang lhan @210b cig tu longs spyad na dpa' bo de rab tu bsngags pa yin no zhes pa la sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: If one enjoys together with that external limb which has the nature of mantra and seal, that hero is praised.

original: sngags dang yang dag par ldan pa ni sngags kyi mnyam pa nyid dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sngags dang yang dag par ldan pa ni sngags kyi mnyam pa nyid dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: Having mantra means having the equality of mantra.

original: de la longs spyad pa ni dpal he ru ka'i sprul pa bdag nyid kyis lha mo rnams la yang nye bar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la bya'o //
analyzed: de la longs spyad pa ni dpal he ru ka'i sprul pa bdag nyid kyis lha mo rnams la yang nye bar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la bya'o //
translated: Enjoying means that the hero should enjoy the yoginis, who are emanations of Sri Heruka himself, with the goddesses.

original: de yang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad kyi 'dod pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad kyi 'dod pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: And that is the desire of all yogini tantras, as it is said, the desire of all yogini tantras.

original: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It is said, Sri Heruka, etc.

original: gzhan du yang rtag tu dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor gzung ba ni dgos pa yin pa'i phyir gzungs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan du yang rtag tu dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor gzung ba ni dgos pa yin pa'i phyir gzungs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And elsewhere, always holding the yoga of Sri Heruka is the purpose, so it is said, the dhara·πáƒ´, etc.üîΩ üîΩDhƒÅra·πáƒ´ means the yoga of Sri Heruka.

original: rnal 'byor zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi sbyor ba gang la yod pa ni rnal 'byor gyi gzungs kyi khyad par ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi sbyor ba gang la yod pa ni rnal 'byor gyi gzungs kyi khyad par ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúyoga‚Äù is a particular dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of yoga, that is, of the application of yoga.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: It is nondual intuition.

original: dpal he ru ka gnyis med ces pa de nyid do //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka gnyis med ces pa de nyid do //
translated: The glorious Heruka is nondual, that is, just that.

original: de bzhin du sems kyis kyang ste tshig gcig nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sems kyis kyang ste tshig gcig nyid do //
translated: And so is the mind, the same word.

original: 'di rnams ci lta bas bgegs med par 'grub pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di rnams ci lta bas bgegs med par 'grub pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are accomplished without obstacles, just as they are.

original: de ltar gzhan gyi thabs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan gyi thabs ni ma yin no //

original: zhes go bar bya ba'i phyir bgegs med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes go bar bya ba'i phyir bgegs med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to make that understood, he says ‚Äúwithout obstacles,‚Äù and so on.

original: de yang pho nya mo'i mchog ni gtso bos de lta bur gyur pa'i rdzas lha rdzas kyi dngos grub tu rung ba yin no //üîΩlhan cig bzod bde ldan pa //
analyzed: de yang pho nya mo'i mchog ni gtso bos de lta bur gyur pa'i rdzas lha rdzas kyi dngos grub tu rung ba yin no // lhan cig bzod bde ldan pa //
translated: And that is the supreme messenger, the chief substance fit for the divine powers.üîΩEndowed with the bliss of patience,

original: ma chags dga' bas yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: ma chags dga' bas yang dag sbyor //
translated: one should unite with the joy of nonattachment.

original: zhes pa ni phyir rol gyi dga' ba'i yang dag par gang sbyor ba snyed nas ma chags pa ni rtag tu rnal 'byor ba rnam par chags par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyir rol gyi dga' ba'i yang dag par gang sbyor ba snyed nas ma chags pa ni rtag tu rnal 'byor ba rnam par chags par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Yoga is concentration.üîΩSubstance is what is to be eaten.üîΩThe yogi/nƒ´ who is always unattached to the external, i.e. to the real thing, is not attached to the internal, i.e. to the imagined.üîΩYoga is concentration.

original: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Substance is what is to be eaten.üîΩThe yogi/nƒ´ who is always unattached to the external, i.e. to the real thing, is not attached to the internal, i.e. to the imagined.üîΩYoga is concentration.

original: rdzas ni bza' bar bya ba'o //üîΩde gnyis gzhan dag gi rnal 'byor dang bza' ba dag rnam pa'i cha ga yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: rdzas ni bza' bar bya ba'o // de gnyis gzhan dag gi rnal 'byor dang bza' ba dag rnam pa'i cha ga yin pa de ni de bzhin no //

analyzed: yang na rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i rdzas ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: Yoga is concentration.üîΩSubstance is what is to be eaten.üîΩThe yogi/nƒ´ who is always unattached to the external, i.e. to the real thing, is not attached to the internal, i.e. to the imagined.üîΩYoga is concentration.üîΩSubstance is what is to be eaten.üîΩThe yogi/nƒ´ who is always unattached to the external, i.e. to the real thing, is not attached to the internal, i.e. to the imagined.üîΩYoga is concentration.

analyzed: rnam par phye ba ni rnam pa'i cha shas su byas la shes rab tu lhan cig tu longs spyad pa ni cha shas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Substance is what is to be eaten.üîΩThe yogi/nƒ´ who is always unattached to the external, i.e. to the real thing, is not attached to the internal, i.e. to the imagined.üîΩYoga is concentration.

original: khyad par can gyi cha 'di ni rnam pa'i cha ste /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi cha 'di ni rnam pa'i cha ste /
translated: Substance is what is to be eaten.üîΩThe yogi/nƒ´ who is always unattached to the external, i.e. to the real thing, is not attached to the internal, i.e. to the imagined.üîΩYoga is concentration.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni rnam par cha'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni rnam par cha'o //
translated: Substance is what is to be eaten.üîΩThe yogi/nƒ´ who is always unattached to the external, i.e. to the real thing, is not attached to the internal, i.e. to

original: rnal 'byor pas bla ma'i man nga gla dga' bar gyur cig ces pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas bla ma'i man nga gla dga' bar gyur cig ces pa'i phyir /
translated: The yogi, having received the guru's instruction, should be delighted, thinking, May I be happy!

original: bla ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus, he says, the guru's, etc.

original: dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor gyi man ngag bla mas byin pa la yang dag par dga'o zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor gyi man ngag bla mas byin pa la yang dag par dga'o zhes dgongs so //
translated: He thinks, I am delighted by the guru's gift of the instruction in the yoga of Sri Heruka.

original: de'i phyir de'i don ni de'i don du gnyer ba'o zhes pa ni de'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i don ni de'i don du gnyer ba'o zhes pa ni de'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of that is one who is intent on that meaning, that is the meaning of that.

original: 'dir yang nor ni dad pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang nor ni dad pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here, wealth is faith, etc.

original: de ltar yang dad pa'i nor dang / shes rab kyi nor @211a * //
analyzed: de ltar yang dad pa'i nor dang / shes rab kyi nor @211a * //
translated: Thus, it is said, the wealth of faith, the wealth of wisdom,

original: dang ; thos pa'i nor dang / brtson 'grus kyi nor dang / dga' ba'i nor dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nor dang / dran pa'i nor dang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dang ; thos pa'i nor dang / brtson 'grus kyi nor dang / dga' ba'i nor dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nor dang / dran pa'i nor dang zhes gsungs so //
translated: the wealth of learning, the wealth of effort, the wealth of joy, the wealth of samadhi, and the wealth of mindfulness.

original: de'i ster ba ni /
analyzed: de'i ster ba ni /
translated: The giver of that is

original: 'dod pa'i don ni rdzogs bya gang //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don ni rdzogs bya gang //
translated: the one who fulfills the desired aim.

original: zhes pa ni nor ster ba dpal he ru ka dang de mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni nor ster ba dpal he ru ka dang de mnyam pa'o //
translated: The giver of wealth is Sri Heruka, who is equal to that.

original: nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg dang 'jig rten pa'i sbyin sreg ni phyi rol du gyur ba'i phyir rigs gcig tu brjod pa gang yin pa de yang le'u zhes kyang bya ste /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg dang 'jig rten pa'i sbyin sreg ni phyi rol du gyur ba'i phyir rigs gcig tu brjod pa gang yin pa de yang le'u zhes kyang bya ste /
translated: The inner fire sacrifice and the worldly fire sacrifice are said to be of one kind because they are external. That is also called a chapter.

original: de nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg dang rigs gcig gi cho ga'i le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o zhes bya ba ni dpal 'khor lo sdom ba'i dka' 'grel las le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: de nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg dang rigs gcig gi cho ga'i le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o zhes bya ba ni dpal 'khor lo sdom ba'i dka' 'grel las le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o /
translated: That is the twenty-eighth chapter of the procedure of the inner fire sacrifice and of one kind.

original: // / drod kyi bya ba med par ni spyod pa med de de'i phyir de bstan ba'i don du le'u ni de nas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: // / drod kyi bya ba med par ni spyod pa med de de'i phyir de bstan ba'i don du le'u ni de nas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Without the performance of the heat, there is no practice. Therefore, in order to teach that, the chapter begins with then.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg la sogs pa bstan pa'i rjes su'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg la sogs pa bstan pa'i rjes su'o //
translated: Then means after teaching the inner fire sacrifice and so forth.

original: gzhan zhes pa ni gzhan no //
analyzed: gzhan zhes pa ni gzhan no //
translated: Another means different.

original: ci zhes ba bstan pa ni zhes gsungs te gzhan yang bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhes ba bstan pa ni zhes gsungs te gzhan yang bstan pa'o //
translated: What? is the question. Is taught means it is taught again.

original: ci'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Why? is the meaning.

original: gang gi don du zhes pa la pho nya'i mtshan nyid shes bar bya //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi don du zhes pa la pho nya'i mtshan nyid shes bar bya // zhes gsungs te /
translated: One should know the characteristics of the messenger.

original: de'i mtshan nyid shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid shes pa'o //
translated: One should know her characteristics.

original: gang gis yang dag shes 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang gis yang dag shes 'gyur ba //
translated: By whom will one know correctly?

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig gnas //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig gnas //
translated: The dakinis abide by their commitments.

original: zhes pa ni sgra'i gnyis pa'i don gyi dang po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sgra'i gnyis pa'i don gyi dang po'o //
translated: This is the first of the two meanings of the genitive case.

original: spun ni dpa' bo'o //
analyzed: spun ni dpa' bo'o //
translated: The brother is the hero.

original: pha ni dpal he ru ga'o //
analyzed: pha ni dpal he ru ga'o //
translated: The father is glorious Heruka.

original: bdag po nyid du mthong ba nyid bdag bo nyid do //
analyzed: bdag po nyid du mthong ba nyid bdag bo nyid do //
translated: Seeing him as the lord is the lord.

original: sngags kyi mthus skad cig gis so //
analyzed: sngags kyi mthus skad cig gis so //
translated: By the power of mantra, in an instant.

original: lce sbom zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dmar ser gyi mig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: lce sbom zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dmar ser gyi mig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: As for the one with a thick tongue and so on, the one with reddish-brown eyes is just so.

original: reg na rtsub cing dmar ser gyi bla dang skra gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //üîΩdngos grub kun gyi thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: reg na rtsub cing dmar ser gyi bla dang skra gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no // dngos grub kun gyi thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The one with reddish-brown hair and skin rough to the touch is just so.üîΩIn order to teach the commonality of all powers,

original: dngos grub kun gyi thun mong ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dngos grub kun gyi thun mong ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúthe commonality of all powers‚Äù and so on.

original: dran pa dang sams  dang yang dag par ldan pa ni yang dag par rjes su sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa dang sams  dang yang dag par ldan pa ni yang dag par rjes su sbyor ba'o //
translated: Possessing mindfulness and mind, one is properly engaged. üîΩWhat is to be thought?

original: ci bsam zhes pa la pho nya la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci bsam zhes pa la pho nya la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The messenger, etc., is stated.

original: go 'phang bcas zhes gsungs te sogs pa'i sgra ni dam tshig bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: go 'phang bcas zhes gsungs te sogs pa'i sgra ni dam tshig bsrung ba'o //
translated: The term etc. refers to the protection of the commitments.

original: go 'phang ni ye shes de dang bcas pa ni dran pa dang mnyam par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: go 'phang ni ye shes de dang bcas pa ni dran pa dang mnyam par ldan pa'o //
translated: The state is the gnosis, and along with means possessing mindfulness.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar ston te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar ston te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: dam tshig can gyis 'bad pas pho nye mo bsgom par bya zhes so //
analyzed: dam tshig can gyis 'bad pas pho nye mo bsgom par bya zhes so //
translated: One who has the commitments should meditate on the messenger with effort.

original: pho nya mo ci tsam zhes pa la /
analyzed: pho nya mo ci tsam zhes pa la /
translated: How many messengers?

original: mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi //üîΩspyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi // spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster //
translated: The twenty-four dakinis

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: grant the supreme fruit of conduct and liberation.

original: rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir bcu gnyis po yang 'dir shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir bcu gnyis po yang 'dir shes par bya'o //
translated: The twenty-four dakinis beginning with Pracha·πá·∏çƒÅ are indicated by the term etc., and the twelve should be understood here as well.

original: de ci'i don du de bsgom zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de ci'i don du de bsgom zhes gsungs te /
translated: For what purpose is she to be meditated upon?

original: @211b spyod pa ni mtho ris la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: @211b spyod pa ni mtho ris la sogs pa'o //
translated: The conduct is heaven, etc.

original: grol ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi 'ching ba spangs pa'o //
analyzed: grol ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi 'ching ba spangs pa'o //
translated: Liberation is the abandonment of the bondage of afflictions.

original: de'i 'bras bu phul du phyung ba ster ba zhes pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu phul du phyung ba ster ba zhes pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: The bestowal of the fruit of that is the best, and that is just so.

original: de rnams dpal he ru ka'i gtso bo byas pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsgoms la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de rnams dpal he ru ka'i gtso bo byas pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsgoms la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having meditated on those abiding in the ma·πá·∏çala with ≈örƒ´ Heruka as the principal one, in order to recite the root mantra, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares the root mantra, etc.üîΩIt is easy to understand.

original: go sla'o // 'jig rten gsum la dbang bar skye ba ni yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: go sla'o // 'jig rten gsum la dbang bar skye ba ni yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be born with power over the three worlds, that is, will arise.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de nas spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu star /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de nas spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu star /
translated: Therefore, then, the fruit of conduct and liberation is bestowed.

original: ci'i phyir de ltar zhes ba la sngags zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar zhes ba la sngags zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Why is it so? He declares mantra.

original: sngags ni de nyid bskul zhing zlos pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni de nyid bskul zhing zlos pa'o //
translated: The mantra is the invocation and repetition of that.

original: phyag rgya ni lha'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni lha'o //
translated: The seal is the deity.

original: de dag dang sgrub pa po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dag dang sgrub pa po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: One is endowed with those and the adept.

original: dngos grub la ched du byed par yod pa'i sgrub pa po yin no //
analyzed: dngos grub la ched du byed par yod pa'i sgrub pa po yin no //
translated: He is a practitioner who is intent on spiritual powers.

original: sngags 'ba' zhig kho na ci'i phyir bzlas zhes pa la sogs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags 'ba' zhig kho na ci'i phyir bzlas zhes pa la sogs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Why should one recite only the mantra?

original: lha mo bsgom pa dang bral na nye bar mngon du byed pa'i byed pa po sngags kyi las ma yin par thob par mi 'gyur zhes ba'i don to //
analyzed: lha mo bsgom pa dang bral na nye bar mngon du byed pa'i byed pa po sngags kyi las ma yin par thob par mi 'gyur zhes ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that without the meditation on the goddess, the mantra is not the means of attaining the desired result.

original: lus ni rnal 'byor ba ste khyad par can gyi lus su sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus ni rnal 'byor ba ste khyad par can gyi lus su sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The body is the yogi, because he is united with the special body.

original: de yang sngags la nye bar mngon du sbyor zhing gus pas rgyun du yun ring po'i dus su goms par go bar bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang sngags la nye bar mngon du sbyor zhing gus pas rgyun du yun ring po'i dus su goms par go bar bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'o //
translated: And that is to be understood as realized by being devoted to the mantra, by being applied to it, and by being habituated to it for a long time.

original: de nyid ci'i phyir zhes pa la ji ltar dro ba'i bya ba'i bdag nyid ces pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid ci'i phyir zhes pa la ji ltar dro ba'i bya ba'i bdag nyid ces pa gsungs te /
translated: Why is that? It is said, Just as the nature of the activity of heat.

original: sems can gzhug par bya ba'i don du zhib dang rgyas pa dang mngon spyod la sogs ba ni dro ba'i bya ba bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhug par bya ba'i don du zhib dang rgyas pa dang mngon spyod la sogs ba ni dro ba'i bya ba bskyed pa'o //
translated: For the sake of engaging sentient beings, the activity of heat is generated by pacifying, increasing, and destroying, etc.

original: de ji ltar bdag yin ba ni de bzhin du nus pa'o //
analyzed: de ji ltar bdag yin ba ni de bzhin du nus pa'o //
translated: How is that the self? It is so by its power.

original: de nyid nus pa zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: de nyid nus pa zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
translated: This is the same as the power.

original: gang dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa de rnams la tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal la sogs par byed pa'i nus pa bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gang dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa de rnams la tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal la sogs par byed pa'i nus pa bstan par bya'o //
translated: Now, in order to show the power to make those who harm the Three Jewels suffer in this very life, and so on,

original: 'o na kyang 'jig rten pha rol tu yang sngags kyi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir gang zhig sdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'o na kyang 'jig rten pha rol tu yang sngags kyi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir gang zhig sdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he says, And whoever hates, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor chen po ni dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po ni dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The great yoga is the yoga of Sri Heruka.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //üîΩrnal 'byor chen po las gzhan ni byang chub kyi sgrub byed ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o // rnal 'byor chen po las gzhan ni byang chub kyi sgrub byed ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: bsrubs gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bsrubs gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to show that nothing other than the great yoga is the means of accomplishing enlightenment, he says, The one who is churned, and so on.

original: dad bas mngon par yid ches pa gang srub pa nyid bzhin du rnal 'byor pa gzhan la go bar byed na 'bras bu cung zad kyang med do zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: dad bas mngon par yid ches pa gang srub pa nyid bzhin du rnal 'byor pa gzhan la go bar byed na 'bras bu cung zad kyang med do zhes dgongs so //
translated: If one who has faith and is convinced does not practice, then there is not even the slightest result, if one teaches yoga to others.

original: rnal 'byor gzhan ni bzang ba'i rgyu nyid du gzung ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gzhan ni bzang ba'i rgyu nyid du gzung ba'o //
translated: The other yoga is to be taken as the cause of good.

original: mchod par byed ces pa ni mchod par byed pa'am /
analyzed: mchod par byed ces pa ni mchod par byed pa'am /
translated: Worship means to worship.üîΩThus means just as.

original: 'di lta ste rnal 'byor gzhan @212a * //
analyzed: 'di lta ste rnal 'byor gzhan @212a * //
translated: The other yoga means the yoga of the hero.

original: 'chang bas 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir rnal 'byor gzhan la bstan pa ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'chang bas 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir rnal 'byor gzhan la bstan pa ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach that it does not serve the purpose of the next world, he says, the teaching of the other yoga.

original: dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pa bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang bsod nams skyed byed du bstan pa'i phyir rnal 'byor che 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pa bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang bsod nams skyed byed du bstan pa'i phyir rnal 'byor che 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach that the place where the yoga of Sri Heruka resides also generates merit, he says, the great yoga holder, etc.

original: rigs ngan gtum mo la sogs pa'i yul yang dpa' bos yongs su brtags pa ste /
analyzed: rigs ngan gtum mo la sogs pa'i yul yang dpa' bos yongs su brtags pa ste /
translated: The place of the low-caste Ca·πá·∏çƒÅlƒ´, etc. is also examined by the hero.

original: de gang yin pa'i yul nyid du yongs su brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de gang yin pa'i yul nyid du yongs su brtag par bya'o //
translated: That very place should be examined.

original: de ru zhes pa ni dpal he ru ka'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i yul dang 'brel pa gang yin pa'i sems can de rnams yongs su bzung ba'i don du rtag tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de ru zhes pa ni dpal he ru ka'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i yul dang 'brel pa gang yin pa'i sems can de rnams yongs su bzung ba'i don du rtag tu gnas pa'o //
translated: There means that he always abides in order to take care of those beings who are related to the place blessed by ≈örƒ´ Heruka.

original: nus pa ni sngags kyi nus pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa ni sngags kyi nus pa'o //
translated: Power means the power of the mantra.

original: gnas skabs ni dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pa bzhugs pa'i yul gyi sems can gyi don du nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs ni dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pa bzhugs pa'i yul gyi sems can gyi don du nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The occasion is the abiding of the mantra for the sake of the beings of the place where the yogƒ´ of ≈örƒ´ Heruka resides.

original: pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang nus pa'i gnas skabs shes par bya ba'i don du brjod pa gang yin pa de yang yin la le'u yang yin pas de de bzhin no //
analyzed: pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang nus pa'i gnas skabs shes par bya ba'i don du brjod pa gang yin pa de yang yin la le'u yang yin pas de de bzhin no //
translated: That which is stated for the purpose of knowing the characteristics and the power of the messenger is also a chapter, thus it is so.

original: nyi shu rtsa dgu ni nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o zhes bya ba ni dpal 'khor lo sdom ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa dgu ni nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o zhes bya ba ni dpal 'khor lo sdom ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
translated: The twenty-ninth is the twenty-ninth, the commentary on the twenty-ninth chapter of the glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara.

original: // / de nas zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba bkod pa'i rjes su gzhan bkod pa bshad pa'o //
analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba bkod pa'i rjes su gzhan bkod pa bshad pa'o //
translated: Then, after the arrangement of the root mantra extraction, the other arrangement is explained.

original: de dgod par bya ste /
analyzed: de dgod par bya ste /
translated: That should be set forth.

original: 'dir yi ge dang gug skyed dgod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir yi ge dang gug skyed dgod pa'o //
translated: Here, the letters and the curves are set down.

original: re mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i rgyud kyi ri mo'o //
analyzed: re mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i rgyud kyi ri mo'o //
translated: The lines of the forty-nine squares.

original: ji lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la shin tu rnyed dka' zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ji lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la shin tu rnyed dka' zhes gsungs so //
translated: As for what kind, it is said to be very difficult to find.

original: gang gi phyir 'di las bzhi pa'i sngags btu ba de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di las bzhi pa'i sngags btu ba de ni de bzhin no //
translated: Because the mantra of the fourth is extracted from this, it is just so.

original: sngags nyid btu ba'i khyad par ci yin zhes pa la /
analyzed: sngags nyid btu ba'i khyad par ci yin zhes pa la /
translated: What is the special extraction of the mantra?

original: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: As for what, etc., it is said:

original: gang zhig ni sngags kyis so //
analyzed: gang zhig ni sngags kyis so //
translated: What is by the mantra.

original: myur du dngos grub rab bsgrub pa //
analyzed: myur du dngos grub rab bsgrub pa //
translated: Quickly accomplishing the highest power

original: zhes pa ni des bgegs rab tu zhi ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni des bgegs rab tu zhi ba'o //
translated: is the pacification of obstacles by that.

original: gang la dgod ces pa la sa'i cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gang la dgod ces pa la sa'i cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: As for where to set, it is said: the part of the earth, etc.

original: tsandan ni bdud rtsi lngar mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: tsandan ni bdud rtsi lngar mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Sandalwood is the five ambrosias,

original: da'i rang gi ngo bo shes pa dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da'i rang gi ngo bo shes pa dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because knowing its own nature generates joy.

original: dri zhim dri ni tsandan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dri zhim dri ni tsandan la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sweet scent is sandalwood, etc.

original: bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres la dri zhim pa'i dris sa'i cha byug par bya'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres la dri zhim pa'i dris sa'i cha byug par bya'o //
translated: and mixed with the five nectars, and anoint the ground with fragrant scents.

original: me tog dri zhim ni tsam pa ka la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: me tog dri zhim ni tsam pa ka la sogs pa'o //
translated: Fragrant flowers are campaka flowers, etc.

original: bdug sbos ni sbyar ba la sogs pa'i bdug spos so //
analyzed: bdug sbos ni sbyar ba la sogs pa'i bdug spos so //
translated: Incense is the incense of the combination, etc.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i gnas su phyogs bcing ba sngon du song bas stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i gnas su phyogs bcing ba sngon du song bas stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In a place that has become like that, having previously bound the directions, one should meditate on emptiness.

original: yi ge tsam so sor dgram pa ni rab tu dgod pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge tsam so sor dgram pa ni rab tu dgod pa'o //
translated: The distribution of the mere letters is the arrangement.

original: yi ge ni aa la sogs pa dang ka la sogs pa'i yi ge nyid yi ge tsam mo //
analyzed: yi ge ni aa la sogs pa dang ka la sogs pa'i yi ge nyid yi ge tsam mo //
translated: The letters are the mere letters of the vowels such as a and the consonants such as ka.

original: ci byas na zhes pa la mnyam bar bri zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ci byas na zhes pa la mnyam bar bri zhes gsungs te /
translated: What should be done? It is said, ‚Äúwrite evenly.‚Äù

original: mnyam par aa la sogs pa dang ka la sogs @212b pa rim pa bzhin du bris shing bzhag pa nyid do //
analyzed: mnyam par aa la sogs pa dang ka la sogs @212b pa rim pa bzhin du bris shing bzhag pa nyid do //
translated: Write evenly, placing the vowels such as a and the consonants such as ka in order.

original: ci sngon du song bas zhes pa la rdza rnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci sngon du song bas zhes pa la rdza rnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: What should be done previously? It is said, ‚Äúlike a bound clay drum,‚Äù etc.

original: rdza rnga bcings pa nyid kyi dbyibs gang yin pa de bzhin du dgod pa'o //
analyzed: rdza rnga bcings pa nyid kyi dbyibs gang yin pa de bzhin du dgod pa'o //
translated: The arrangement is like the shape of a bound clay drum.

original: lugs las byung ba dang lugs bzlog pa nyid du de dbyangs dang gsal byed bzung bas kha phyir bltas pa nyid kyi rdza rnga dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: lugs las byung ba dang lugs bzlog pa nyid du de dbyangs dang gsal byed bzung bas kha phyir bltas pa nyid kyi rdza rnga dang 'dra'o //
translated: It is like a drum, since it is turned outward by the vowels and consonants being taken in the forward and reverse orders.

original: dpa' bo ni sngags so //
analyzed: dpa' bo ni sngags so //
translated: The hero is the mantra.

original: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
translated: The accomplishment of all desired aims

original: zhes pa ni sngags kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sngags kyi khyad par ro //
translated: is the distinction of the mantra.

original: ci'i phyir de la dpa' bo btu zhes pa la /üîΩrim bzhin 'byung dang rim min pas //
analyzed: ci'i phyir de la dpa' bo btu zhes pa la / rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min pas //
translated: Why is it called the hero's drum?üîΩThe vowels and consonants,

original: dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pa pos //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pa pos // zhes gsungs te /
translated: in the forward and reverse orders,üîΩare to be extracted by the practitioner.

original: dbyangs ni aa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs ni aa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vowels are a, etc.

original: yi ge ni ka la sogs pa sgra'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: yi ge ni ka la sogs pa sgra'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: The consonants are ka, etc., because of their nature as sounds.

original: gang yin pa de btu bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang yin pa de btu bar bya'o //
translated: That which is to be extracted is that.

original: de lta'i grangs kyi nang gtogs pa //
analyzed: de lta'i grangs kyi nang gtogs pa //
translated: The one who is included in the enumeration of that

original: zhes pa ni re mig gi grangs kyi nang du gtogs pa ji ltar yin pa de ltar yang dag par btu'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni re mig gi grangs kyi nang du gtogs pa ji ltar yin pa de ltar yang dag par btu'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: is to be extracted in that way, meaning that the one who is included in the enumeration of the squares is to be extracted in that way.üîΩBy which words?

original: de tshig gang gis zhes dogs pa la thug pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de tshig gang gis zhes dogs pa la thug pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: The one who is included in the enumeration of that is the meaning.

original: re mig sum cu rtsa gnyis blang //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: re mig sum cu rtsa gnyis blang // zhes pa ni /
translated: Take the thirty-second square.

original: re mig ces pa ni sgra'i rkyen med pa'o //

analyzed: sgra'i rkyen med pa'i tshig ni shin tu ring bar brjod pa'o //

original: rig rgyal 'khor los sgyur ba yi //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang // bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du //
translated: and Cakrasa·πÉvara, Vajrabhairava,

original: khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with the four wrathful ones,

original: sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru //
analyzed: sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru //
translated: Together with the eight bodies,

original: dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du yang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du yang //
translated: Also for the sake of protecting the ma·πá·∏çala,üîΩ[he should recite] for the sake of protecting the ma·πá·∏çala

original: sku brgyad ni 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad do //

analyzed: sngags kyi tshig rkang bzhi po zhes pa ni sngags bsdus pa ste /

original: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúO·πÉ, etc.‚Äù is the statement of the mantra.

original: de la 'dir gzhan yang h'um dang phat sbas pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dir gzhan yang h'um dang phat sbas pa'o //
translated: There, here again, the h≈´·πÉ and pha·π≠ are hidden.

analyzed: rdza rnga bcings pas sngags btu ba brjod pa gang yin pa de yang yin le'u yang yin pas de ni de bzhin no //
translated: That is just so, which is both the binding of the clay drum and the mantra extraction, and also a chapter.

original: sum cu ni sum cu pa'o zhes bya ba ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i le'u sum cu ba'i dka' 'grel lo /
analyzed: sum cu ni sum cu pa'o zhes bya ba ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i le'u sum cu ba'i dka' 'grel lo /

original: // / nyi shu rtsa bdun par mchod pa dang gtor ma'i bya ba mdor bstan pa dang / nyi shu rtsa brgyad par sbyin sreg mdor bstan pa rgyas par bshad pa'i don du le'u 'di ste /

translated: The twenty-seventh chapter briefly explains the activities of worship and bali offerings, and the twenty-eighth chapter explains the brief explanation of fire sacrifice.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de nas sbyin sreg go //
analyzed: de nas sbyin sreg go //
translated: Then, the fire sacrifice.

original: de dag kun zhes pa ni bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kun zhes pa ni bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa byed pa'o //
translated: All of them means those who harm the guru, the buddhas, and the bodhisattvas.

original: rdo rje skyes ni sku rdo rje la sogs skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje skyes ni sku rdo rje la sogs skyes pa'o //
translated: The vajra-born is born from the vajra body, etc.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
translated: In the glorious Guhyasamaja Tantra,üîΩit is said:

original: sha chen de dag thams cad kyi //üîΩ'jigs byed rdo rje skyes bu dran //
analyzed: sha chen de dag thams cad kyi // 'jigs byed rdo rje skyes bu dran //
translated: ‚ÄúAll of those great meats

original: zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: zhes gsungs so ;
translated: are remembered by the vajra man of Bhairava.‚Äù

original: / yang na dbyer med pa'i ye shes las skyes pas na rdo rje skyes so //
analyzed: / yang na dbyer med pa'i ye shes las skyes pas na rdo rje skyes so //
translated: Or else, because it is born from the indivisible gnosis, it is born from the vajra.üîΩWhy is it so?

original: ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhes pa la yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhes pa la yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is so, etc.

original: de ni de rnams kyi don no //
analyzed: de ni de rnams kyi don no //
translated: That is the meaning of those [words].

original: de yang gang gi phyir sha chen pos gdug pa can thams cad 'jigs byed chen po yin pas de ltar na sha chen po des bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir sha chen pos gdug pa can thams cad 'jigs byed chen po yin pas de ltar na sha chen po des bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: And that is because the great flesh is the great terror of all the violent ones. Thus, it is the great flesh that should be done, is the meaning.

original: 'dis ni sbyin sreg gzhan las lhag par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni sbyin sreg gzhan las lhag par brjod pa'o //
translated: This [verse] expresses the superiority of the burnt offering over other [offerings].

original: shin tu gdug cing drag po la //
analyzed: shin tu gdug cing drag po la //
translated: For the extremely violent and fierce,

original: zhi ba dag ni rigs ma yin //
analyzed: zhi ba dag ni rigs ma yin //
translated: pacification is not appropriate.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir de rnams ngan song du 'gro ba dgag pa'i don du de ltar da la nges pa'i bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir de rnams ngan song du 'gro ba dgag pa'i don du de ltar da la nges pa'i bzlog par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to prevent their going to the lower realms, one should thus definitely turn them back.

original: de ltar zhes pa ni gdug pa can nyams par byed pa ni khyi la sogs pa'i shas kyang sbyin sreg byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa ni gdug pa can nyams par byed pa ni khyi la sogs pa'i shas kyang sbyin sreg byed pa'o //
translated: Thus means that even the flesh of dogs and so forth, which are violent and corrupting, should be offered in the burnt offering.

original: bza' zhes pa ni mchod pa'i don du bza' ba'o //
analyzed: bza' zhes pa ni mchod pa'i don du bza' ba'o //
translated: Should eat means that one should eat it for the purpose of worship.

original: sha de rnams nyid kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sha de rnams nyid kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should perform the rites of worship, etc. with those very meats.

original: ci 'dis mngon par 'dod par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur zhes pa'i rnam rtog gis @215a * //
analyzed: ci 'dis mngon par 'dod par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur zhes pa'i rnam rtog gis @215a * //
translated: The analysis is: What is this, that it would be or would not be an object of desire?

original: dpyod pa'o // de las phyin ci log ni ma dpyad pa'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa'o // de las phyin ci log ni ma dpyad pa'o //
translated: The opposite of that is non-analysis.

original: de ci zhes pa 'grub cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ci zhes pa 'grub cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: What is that? It is said to be accomplishment, etc.

original: ma lus pa ni lhag ma med pa ste /
analyzed: ma lus pa ni lhag ma med pa ste /
translated: Without remainder means without exception.

original: ral gri la sogs phul du byung ba ma lus pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni ma lus pa ste sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: ral gri la sogs phul du byung ba ma lus pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni ma lus pa ste sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: That which is the accomplishment without remainder of the most excellent sword, etc. is without remainder, i.e. Buddhahood.

original: rgyal srid thams cad ni 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: rgyal srid thams cad ni 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: All kingdoms are those of the world-emperors.

original: de dag rang nyid kyis srog bcad pa ma yin par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: de dag rang nyid kyis srog bcad pa ma yin par gzung ba'o //
translated: It is understood that they are not killed by oneself.

original: spyod par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas snod ni thod pa la bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir dung dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: spyod par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas snod ni thod pa la bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir dung dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach that the vessel of the practitioner of yoga is a skull, he says, conch, etc.

original: mu tig ni mu tig bskyed pa'i srog chags kyi khyad par te ;
analyzed: mu tig ni mu tig bskyed pa'i srog chags kyi khyad par te ;
translated: Pearl is a particular kind of creature that produces pearls.

original: de'i rus pa'i khyad pa la yang mu tig gi sgras brjod do //
analyzed: de'i rus pa'i khyad pa la yang mu tig gi sgras brjod do //
translated: The particular bone of the skull is also called a pearl.

original: ji ltar dung la sogs pa rig byed pa rnams kyi dag byed yin pa de thod pa yang yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dung la sogs pa rig byed pa rnams kyi dag byed yin pa de thod pa yang yin no //
translated: Just as the conch and so on are purifying for the followers of the Vedas, so too is the skull.

original: srog chags kyi yan lag tu khyad par med par bstan pa'i phyir gsum char rgyu las byung ba yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: srog chags kyi yan lag tu khyad par med par bstan pa'i phyir gsum char rgyu las byung ba yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: In order to show that there is no difference between the parts of living beings, it is said that all three arise from causes.

original: rgyu ni las dang nyon mongs pa dang phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni las dang nyon mongs pa dang phung po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The causes are karma, afflictions, aggregates, and so on.

original: des dung la sogs pa gsum po'i rgyu de las byung ba'o //
analyzed: des dung la sogs pa gsum po'i rgyu de las byung ba'o //
translated: The conch and so on arise from those causes.

original: de bzhin mi yang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin mi yang yin no //
translated: So too is the human.

original: de bas na rig byed smra ba rnams thod pa la ci'i phyir smod par byed /
analyzed: de bas na rig byed smra ba rnams thod pa la ci'i phyir smod par byed /
translated: Therefore, why do the followers of the Vedas disparage the skull?

original: 'on te sman la sogs pa bzhin nye bar mkho ba yin pas dung la sogs pa ni dag byed nyid du bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'on te sman la sogs pa bzhin nye bar mkho ba yin pas dung la sogs pa ni dag byed nyid du bya ba ste /
translated: But since it is useful like medicine and so on, the conch and so on are employed as purifying substances.

original: des na dgos pa mthong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na dgos pa mthong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the purpose is seen.

original: ci bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thod pa la dgos pa mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: ci bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thod pa la dgos pa mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: But did not the BhagavƒÅn also see the purpose of the skull?

original: gang gi phyir rin po che skye 'gro thams cad kyi thun mong rang gi ngo bo nyid du shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rin po che skye 'gro thams cad kyi thun mong rang gi ngo bo nyid du shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because the jewel is not known to be the nature of all beings in common.

original: su zhig smod ces pa la chos kyi ye shes lus can zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: su zhig smod ces pa la chos kyi ye shes lus can zhes gsungs so //
translated: Who would revile? He says the one who has the body of the knowledge of phenomena.

original: chos rnams ni phung po la sogs pa rnams te stong pa nyid la sogs par rtogs pa ni ye shes so //
analyzed: chos rnams ni phung po la sogs pa rnams te stong pa nyid la sogs par rtogs pa ni ye shes so //
translated: The phenomena are the aggregates, etc., and the knowledge is the realization of emptiness, etc.

original: de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: That which is the body of that very nature is just that, i.e., the yogi.

original: de rnams te sgra'i bdun pa'i don la drug pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams te sgra'i bdun pa'i don la drug pa'o //
translated: Those are the six, in the sense of the seventh case, the dative.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dpal he ru ka yang de 'dzin pas su zhig smod ces bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dpal he ru ka yang de 'dzin pas su zhig smod ces bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that who would revile? since he also holds the glory of Heruka,

original: thod pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: thod pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he says skull, etc.

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de ni thod pa'i phreng ba can te /
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de ni thod pa'i phreng ba can te /
translated: The one who has the nature of a garland of skulls is the one with a garland of skulls.

original: spyi bo la sogs pa nyid dam thod pa'i phreng ba gang la yod pa ni sgra'i mu tig gi don du ai ya'i rkyen byin pa ste /
analyzed: spyi bo la sogs pa nyid dam thod pa'i phreng ba gang la yod pa ni sgra'i mu tig gi don du ai ya'i rkyen byin pa ste /
translated: The one who has a garland of skulls on his head, etc., is the one who has the condition of the vowel i for the purpose of the pearl of the word.

original: de bas na dbu @215b la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na dbu @215b la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba 'chang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, he wears a garland of five skulls on his head.

original: dpa' bo ni grogs med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dpa' bo ni grogs med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: He is a hero because he is alone.

original: zla phyed nyid du byas pa ni 'dus nas brgyan pa gang yin pa de yang zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas pa'o //
analyzed: zla phyed nyid du byas pa ni 'dus nas brgyan pa gang yin pa de yang zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas pa'o //
translated: The one who is made half-moon is the one who is adorned with the assembly, and he is also adorned with the half-moon.

original: nag nog med pa'i rnam par dag pa'i sprul par gzung ba'i phyir zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba'o //üîΩdba' bo rnams kyi nang nas kyang gang yin de la dpa' bo ste /
analyzed: nag nog med pa'i rnam par dag pa'i sprul par gzung ba'i phyir zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba'o // dba' bo rnams kyi nang nas kyang gang yin de la dpa' bo ste /
translated: He wears the half-moon because he is the emanation of the pure, stainless form.üîΩHe is the hero among the heroes, and he is the one who is victorious over the heroes, such as the lion and RƒÅhu.

original: seng ge dang 'phrog byed la sogs pa las de rgyal ba gang yin pa de ni dran pa ste rab tu grags pa na ci'i phyir smad par byed //
analyzed: seng ge dang 'phrog byed la sogs pa las de rgyal ba gang yin pa de ni dran pa ste rab tu grags pa na ci'i phyir smad par byed //

original: rang gi yan lag mgor byas la //

translated: The offering activity is just that, which is the nature of the identity of the embrace of VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´, who is absorbed in union with the yoga of nonduality and indivisibility.
